name: Mikayla Perkins
text:
DO NOT TAKE YOUR RING TO GET RESIZED HERE.
I took my ring to be resized on July 24th and I was told that it would be ready by August 4rd. All I brought in was a simple wedding band. It is now August 17th and every time we call and ask about it they give us a date that they guarantee it will be done and then it isn’t. My wedding is this Saturday August 21st and if I would have known this was going to be this big of an issue I would have taken it to a local jeweler. I’ve had much more detailed rings done in 3 days and they have taken almost a month to complete this ring. They did not tell me when I took it in that they ship it somewhere else to get resized other wise I wouldn’t of let them because it is my grandmothers wedding band and I don’t trust it being shipped because things can happen. I am furious. DO NOT SHOP HERE!

name: Becky Champion
text: Richard did great. thanks

name: Ceairra Blair
text: I’m very disappointed in Zales! I wish I could rate them a ZERO!!! I spent good money with them and also payed extra for next day shipping and it’s almost been 6 days and still no item!!!  I will never shop with Zales again.

name: Mike VonBoeckman
text: Don't know did not go there!

name: Luis Vargas
text: Great staff always very friendly

name: Shawna Sneed
text: If I could give a zero star rating, i would. These people are incredibly rude. They promised my rings would be ready, from being sized, on a certain date. Of course, they are pushing me back another week. Worst of all, the associate made it out like it was my fault. I bought and paid for a wedding set. I knew it would need to be sized. I sure as heck didn't realize that attitudes from several associates would be a part of my sales experience.  NEVER AGAIN! THIS DIAMOND CARD HOLDER JUST SHREDDED HER CARD!!!

name: Adam Campbell
text: August 31, 2021- 11:30a.m.!! Still not open

name: leonor jefferson
text: Racsits. Treatment is horrible.   Never do business with them.

name: Theresa Owens
text: I would NOT recommend Zales to anyone. We have been completely disappointed in their service. My engagement ring has been gone for repairs now for SIX weeks and it's still not back. Stay away from Zales! We will not be buying our wedding bands or anything else from there.

name: Ruby Winkles
text:
Very nice today. Had to send my ring off due to stones were loose. I was told 3 weeks when it came back they had to resend it back which took another 7 days. When I called after the date it was due back was told they sent it back no one called me to give me this information
I wasn't happy but now have my ring back so be prepared for it to take longer than they say

name: Bobby White
text: Came in for last minute gift on Christmas Eve and they were so nice. Even gift wrapped them for free!

name: Terri Gann
text: Very knowledgeable and great customer service.

name: Maurice Blumberg
text: Great people, product, payment plans, rewards, trade in, warranties, shows and on and on.....

name: Grace Lane
text:
DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM. They do not care about their customers and obviously don't care about their ratings. My husband bought me a ring that needed sized. Was told i would have it back in 2 wks. It turned into 4wks. I got the ring back, my brand new ring, scratched up and the engravings were so messed up you couldn't read it. I was NOT happy. Know what they said? We will send it out again to get fixed, it'll take 4wks. I know it'll turn into 6wks if not longer, if they don't lose my ring or mess it up once again. No compensation on my end for their screw up either.
Think that's all they did? Nope. Paid a large payment down. It wasn't showing on the account that it was paid at all...even though they took the money from my account. Over a week later and everyone at the store is rude. Anyone in the phone is rude. Well, can you give us your card number? Well, you have that already because you took the money from my account. What's your banks number? Are you kidding me? Been on the phone 5 times and at the store 3 times...still isn't fixed. They are trying to pocket $500 without letting it reflect on my account and that will not happen with me.

Trust me...do not ever even walk into this place

name: Jonathan pike
text: VERY nice Employees very well knowledgeable!

name: bigdogg139
text: Great Customer Service!!

name: casey Stewart
text: Bad service, takes a full month just to have a ring sized and they are not professional over the phone at all I will never buy from a zales again.

name: Toni Duplantis
text: My husband purchased a pair of emerald earrings that fell apart the third time wearing. Then they replaced, but with a lower  quality emeralds. It would seem that they should have used the better stones, but they didn’t.

name: Cassandra Myers
text: I always receive a warm welcome from the Jared team members. My jewelry consultant Jessica is always engaging, thoughtful and ensures that I have a positive experience.

name: Willie Rhodes
text: From the bottom of my ❤️ I want to give a HUGE!!!! Thumbs up and Hugs to Thomas Blais and the entire staff at Jared’s. When I tell you Thomas Blais had my wife smiling through her mask 😷 I was sold. Now I truly understand why he went to Jared. Thanks 🙏 again for all your help.

name: Robin Michelle Young
text: I just have to say what an amazing experience.  Thank you so much Trixie and Genevieve for taking time and paying attention to the little things.  I was a bit upset to find that the original ring I had ordered for my husband was not in stock in his size, resizing was not an option due to it being an online purchase.  These amazing ladies calmed me right down and showed me some gorgeous rings, turned a stressful situation into a very happy one.  Little did I know that I would fall in love with the rings that Genevieve showed me.  She has an artists eye for detail.  I described my husband and myself to her and she worked Magix by creating the perfect combination of rings for us.  I couldn't be happier and they are so much more beautiful than my original choices.  Trixie, your customer service was impeccable.  I can't thank you enough.  The two of you created an amazing dynamic that made sorting out an issue into a wonderful memory.  Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

name: Patty Robertson
text: Overall, my husband and I have had a pleasant experience with the staff at Jareds. They have beautiful jewelry. The ladies that work in sales are very pleasant, nice, and helpful. They always are very friendly toward us and really pay attention to what we are looking for when making important purchases. We have always had a great experience when purchasing jewelry from Jareds.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Robin and Kayla were so nice and helpful . They are both true Assets to Jared's

name: Kendell Lewis
text: Thank you to Trixie for making my current wedding ring what I envisioned. She helped me locate two bands that would serve as a guard to my engagement ring that was purchased several years ago. She found exactly what I wanted within my budget and arranged for them to be made into the ring as one piece. The whole process was super easy and the finish product is completely amazing.

name: Tim Richardson
text: Fixed my wife's watch and cleaned her jewelry while we waited.  Also made 2 other purchases while we were there.  Very helpful and friendly.

name: Tyler Thomas
text: The staff here are amazing

name: Erica Hughes
text: I just received my ring from the third time it has had to be repaired (each time was due to an error on their side) and the wedding band is not straight and both rings were not sized correctly. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear my ring since March due to covid and not having a repair tech and then being super backed up... and I understand all of that.. I’m patient. But what I can’t understand is how they can drop the ball so much on something that means so much to me. Would not recommend.

name: mike Bray
text: Liz is the best. She went above and beyond.  Ask for her.

name: Quamaine Hawkins
text:
Kayla is the bombbbbbbb she went over and beyond to get my wife and I what we wanted today!
Thanks Kayla

name: doug p
text:
Great selection of Beautiful crafted jewelry.  Great professionals who help you find what you're looking for.
Don't waste your time going anywhere else.
Take her to Jareds.

name: James Fondren
text: Very nice salespeople good selections and pricing.

name: Bernadette Lovetere
text: My husband and I came in specifically to find titanium wedding bands and their salesman Henry was amazing!! Prices were fantastic also!! 5/5 👌

name: Erika
text: Been waiting for months to do this review. Back in July or August I walked into Jared with my old wedding ring guard from my first marriage with hopes of designing something special for my daughter. Henry Darnell was wonderful in helping me design the best look with the diamonds I had in the ring. Today I was able to finally give the gift to my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loved it!!! Thank you Henry and all who helped at Jared for such a wonderful experience.

name: Terri Carmack
text: We really enjoy coming inand purchasing jewelry here. It is always a top notch service. Prompt, friendly, and courteous. We rely on the knowledge of our sales people and we enjoy working with each and everyone in our selection of our favorite pieces. Thanks Jared!

name: Josh Harrison
text: They are EXTREMELY pushy about getting their warranty plans, to the point that the salesman lied to me about what was covered (I had to look it up on Jared's website to find out), and that they added the warranty to our purchase without telling me (after we declined it) so I had to go back and get a refund.

name: Haley Alonso
text: My now fiancé worked with Elizabeth to get my ring ordered (vera wang wedding set in size 7) and he also bought his wedding band that they altered to fit him (size 15) with no issues. All the ladies were amazing and nice for us. Would most definitely use them again!

name: Amazing Renee
text: I have shopped for all my Jewelery needs and wants for over 20 years at Jared’s. I have always gotten the 5 star treatment whether it was a huge purchase or a simple repair. Yes, SHE takes him to Jared!!!!!!!!!!!!♥️♥️♥️♥️

name: J Wells
text: Very helpful staff! Jessica Langley was my associate and she went above and beyond to meet my expectations!

name: Olive Dykes
text: It sus so grate

name: Samantha Ferguson
text: My boyfriend and I had a fantastic experience at the Jared Mobile location. Henry greeted us right at the door, worked with our budget, and created the most beautiful ring for us. Customer service was amazing. I’d recommend this location and the associate Henry Darnell to anyone. Can’t say enough how truly great the experience was :).

name: Renee Broomfield
text: I drove from Mississippi to purchase a item that was being held for me, but the sales people were not able to find it. Very disappointed. Complete waste of time and gas. The sale person seemed unconcerned and uncaring. I did telephone the manager but have yet to receive any feedback.

name: Allyson
text: Horrible experience! My brother ordered a custom wedding band and they sent the wrong one! He asked about ordering a new one and was told it wouldn’t be here until October (wedding is in September). When a refund was requested, they were extremely rude and unprofessional

name: Amanda Wiley
text: I am fairly new to the Jared family! My now husband bought my engagement ring from Jared and we just couldn't help falling in love with the wonderful staff! Thank you again Trixie and Robin we will always be grateful for the long hours you have given us to ensure that we were truly happy with every piece we receive.

name: katherine bagley
text: Did a wonderful job set the my 5 ct aquamarine into a ring. And when I took it in to get it cleaned they noticed it was loose and tightened it up.  The staff is friendly and very helpful

name: Carol Hunt
text: I purchased a ring, Pandora bracelet and charms and couldn't have been happier with the quality of the jewelry or with the staff. Jessica and Elizabeth were helpful, professional and even though I wasn't planning on purchasing at the time they found things I couldn't resist. They took time to actually talk to me to see what I might like. In the day and age of little to no customer service it was a pleasure to go to a store that is focused on it. I will definitely return to this Jared's for all my jewelry needs.

name: Joy Salas
text: The mobile store has amazing people who are very attentive to their customers. My husband and I have been using Jared’s for our main jewelers for years. The general manager here as well as all of the consultants know their customers by name and are always pleasant. Looking for beautiful and affordable jewelry that you know is real this is the place to go!

name: Pamela Biggs
text: I love this store!  The people are so friendly and take time to show you items. I have made 2 purchases there so far and will be back. Definitely go there if you are looking for jewelry!

name: William Martin
text: This is the best jewelry store I have been to in my twenty years of fine jewelry shopping. I was treated as if I was shopping without a budget. There was no rushing or hurrying. They took their time to show me pieces and made sure that I was happy with my selection. I was so happy with the service I took in my wife’s ring she was left by her mom to have it repaired and resized. It was fixed and looks brand new! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly! This is the only place I will shop for jewelry from now on!

name: Brandi Robinson
text:
My husband and I went to Jarrods’s in Mobile Thursday to buy our granddaughter a pair of earrings for her birthday. The party was on Sunday. Jessica, our sales person, said we don’t have them in this store but let me call another and see if they have them. They did!!! Great!!!! She said they will be overnighted to Mobile store . Plenty of time to get them for the birthday party. Called Friday, did not come in. That’s fine, a truck comes in Saturday and Sunday. We call Saturday. Still hasn’t come in. I call back and ask them to track them. Jessica says it’s not on ‘her’ it’s on the other store that was overnighting them. What?!? I ask her to please follow up and ca them. Ask them what’s going on, have they been sent, can they track them ...
Jessica never bothered calling back.
Poor little grand baby did not get her earrings for her birthday. Thanks a lot Jessica !!!! For not doing your job.

name: Kristin McCarron
text: The location is awesome! Customer service is the best! They were so willing to go out of the way to help me find exactly what I was looking for! I will be sure to shop here for every occasion!

name: Tyler Thomas
text: HANDS DOWN the best customer service! My husband and I went in to look for new wedding bands, and from the moment we stepped foot in the door we were greeted with warm welcomes by the staff. Trixie, Jessica, and Henry to be specific. These employees know what they are doing and know how to make a customer feel comfortable going through such a large purchase. I highly recommend this location and the above mentioned employees.

name: Bethany Heathcock
text: The employees were so nice and very willing to help. They dont discriminate either because i walk inside in very simple clothes. They are very helpful.

name: Shey Thorn
text: This was the absolute best experience in Jewlery shopping in my life. We started off coming in on Monday, when we were greeted by the whole staff and had our sale taken over by Henry. Henry was extremely kind and listened to everything we wanted, we viewed some stunning Men's rings, but decided to sleep on the purchase decision and make our minds up the next day. We came back in today, Tuesday, and we were greeted by Jessica, once again extremely kind and helpful, who helped us complete our sale. Throughout our stress free, easy process we were offered water by the GM, Trixie. She chatted with us about her amazing jewelry endeavors and made us feel right at home as we were completing our purchase. We are still in shock at the OUT OF THIS WORLD INCREDIBLE service we received. We can't wait to continue shopping with Jared, and we look forward to the amazing new selection of items coming within the next months!! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

name: Michael Vanden Heuvel
text: I've never been to any jewelry store in my life. I wanted to propose to my girlfriend, now fiance, and I knew the ring had to be spectacular. I stopped here on a whim for the sake of comparing prices to the other stores in the area. To be frank, I never saw those other stores. After a single visit at this location I was won over by their customer service, products, and in-store repair shop. As soon as I walked in the door I was greeted by Elizabeth Herboso. She was incredibly helpful and really knew her stuff. She helped me every step of the way and made the entire process from beginning to end very smooth, easing my mind any time I became unsure. But most of all she was very friendly and genuinely enthusiastic about getting the exact right ring for me and my bride-to-be. I couldn't have asked for a better first experience and I will most definitely be returning for future purchases.

name: Joe LeNoir
text: I purchased a Tag Heuer F1 watch for my birthday present to myself. The lady who helped me with my purchase was fantastic. Her name was Elizabeth I believe. I got it home and ended up being unhappy with the watch. I googled their return policy and read one after another terrible reviews about their sales persons attitude about returns. So, naturally I expected to have a hard time. Once I got there, I spoke with Karen, the manager very briefly about my issues with the watch. She apologized several times and immediately refunded my money. The process took less than 10 minutes. All in all I was/am very very satisfied with Elizabeth/Karen/Jared! They are great and I highly recommend them. Ill definitely be back to purchase other pieces of jewelry.

name: Robert Turner
text: The protocol to getting the store is ridiculous and the lady working in the store was rude.

name: Brittany Vickers
text: Walked in wanting to upgrade my diamond in my engagement ring. Was immediately greeted and that was it. There 20 min and not helped. Walked out and will never return.

name: William Schenher
text: Kayla helped me and was awsome. She got me in and out fast. Great service. Great salesperson!

name: Sheila Haviland
text: My fiance and I met with Jessica. I told her what I was looking for and she picked out several setting for me.  Found the one I loved and we left keeping that ring in mind.  Visited 2 other jewelers only to return to Jareds. I did change my mind and decided on a cushion cut over a round diamond. She picked out  an almost flawless stone. The setting was white gold and we wanted platinum so they have to make a new setting and the gallery was to small for the stone so they will make the gallery to fit the stone. Awesone service, knowledgeable staff, friendly while being professional, treated us like family. Can't wait to see the end product , another 5-6 weeks. My fiance was pleased with the service  and their attention to details, and that says alot . I have since ordered his platinun wedding band waiting for it to arrive next week

name: WB Spencer
text: Bought my son a Tag Heuer watch for his 16th birthday.  Very helpful staff and helped me pick out the right one for our budget.  I had never shopped a "chain" jewelry store before and was pleasantly surprised.  Will definitely go back here for any future watch or jewelry purchases!

name: Derek Scarbrough
text: Without a doubt the Manager and the staff are the nicest and most helpful you can find. Have bought several items from the mobile store and will continue to do all of my jewelry shopping there.

name: JaCoiya Hall
text: The staff here is unbelievable!  They have become like family .. Everyone is very knowledgeable and sooo inviting .. I find myself in there for at least an hour after getting my jewelry cleaned just chit chatting. .You have to visit this store!!

name: Crystal Hinds
text: WARNING: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM HERE! My husband bought me a necklace we decided to return. He paid cash. The manager informed him they do not have enough of cash in the store (only $420) and they could mail us a check that would take 10 days to receive or they would call us once they have enough of cash onsite. This seems completely inconceivable and absolutely ridiculous to me that a nationwide store could legally operate like this. I’ve never in my life. And we will never, ever shop there again.

name: Christin Lisenby
text: I was shocked to find this location rated a 1 star! Thomas and his team have treated me like family since my first visit in December 2016! They have gone above and beyond and I enjoy doing business with people who put the customer first and are so professional! I rarely leave reviews, but felt the need when seeing one persons negative experience, causing so much damage to this business.... Great job guys! I'm a BIG FAN!!!  Christin

name: Hanna Love
text: The Manager Trixie has a very unpleasant attitude towards her co-worker. I seen her completely ignore a girl in a lab coat because she was doing something on the computer. I seen the girl talking to her and she didn’t even acknowledge her. How can you manage a team and treat them like that. I will not be coming back here. Sorry attitude I did not like. The girl was very kind to her. I had Henry help me with my Ever Us ring and I will recommend friends to see him. I also seen employees standing around talking loud so inapproiate.

name: Kia Sheridan
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience! Emma the salesperson was an absolute doll!

name: The Chambers
text: Always a pleasure doing business their longtime customer

name: Cameron Blake
text: My boyfriend bought me a pair of earrings ($620)which I couldn't have at the time due to circumstances.  So a full refund sounds simple right? wrong. Upon visiting the location  throughout the day only to still be told that they (Jared) didn't have enough cash which sounds silly actually. While being within our 30 day period. This location is very bad as far as customer satisfaction. Both the Black woman and old slim Caucasian woman should seek for another occupation. I was told that night there's another Jared's in Pensacola so I asked well did you call that store to see if they had the amount of cash? basically she informed me that she doesn't have common sense. You wouldn't want to do business with someone who is incompetent would you?

name: Courtney Pemberton
text: Terrible experience. They did not deliver what they had promised, but rather a ring that had bad welds and a crooked diamond. And returning it was a nightmare, they did not refund all the money until we came back a second time. More like a galleria of incompetency.

name: John Wilson
text:
The store is very clean the people that I have dealt with inside are extremely nice and professional however their customer service department is a complete pile of crap. I have a credit card through their Genesis Bank. I was made to put a deposit down when I bought something I was also told that every time I buy something I have to put a deposit down. When I call Genesis they told me that even if I have an available credit limit they run and check your credit every time you purchase something and if they feel like not approving it for whatever reason they will not approve it even though you have available credit on your card they've already given you. I was not happy with that so I called Jared customer service and what I was basically told was we do not control the credit cards are banks policy is our bank's policy if you have a problem with it call them..
I'm 55 years old I think credit cards from different jewelry companies different clothing stores and all other places. When you give me a credit card I expected to be a credit card you don't walk into JCPenney's buy $500 worth of clothes and have to give them $60 in advance you swipe your card you sign your paper and you leave.. what Jared is doing is not giving customers credit cards there financing the jewelry like you with your car or your house but they don't tell you that upfront.. so even though the people and the three different Jared stores that I've been to have been very professional and very nice because of your business practices you guys suck. I will pay the balance off of my card cut it up and never do business with you again..

name: Kim Newman
text: My husband bought me a $2,500 cross necklace as a gift.  The chain was too short, he went back to swap it for a longer chain.  They wanted to give him a $15 credit for the chain and sell him a $150 chain. Really???  So your chains are only worth $15 and you sell them for $150?!!  Crooks! Take my advice NEVER shop at Jared!

name: Kailey Morgan
text: That's really make miracles happen here I love it

name: Jurone Daniels
text: Very friendly staff

name: Bama P
text: Horrible. Bought a ring and had to bring it in constantly for repairs. Whoever works on the jewelry must have gotten their certification from bishop state or something. Yea

name: Laporcha Richardson
text: The whole staff have very nasty attitudes, always have something to say when returning an item with receipt, will never shop here again, i would rather go to Florida.

name: Robert Chavers
text: Busy

name: Mark Brewton
text: Felt pressured by sales staff

name: Louis Dixon
text: Great service. We we're in and out and got exactly what we went for

name: William Denton
text:
I hunted for diamond stud earrings for my wife for our anniversary at many stores for several weeks.. Dealt with the manager and she was most helpful. She found me the perfect pair with the 4 C's I was looking for. She was understanding of what I was looking for and very courteous.  Most of all, she was very professional and helpful with my purchase.

I will always return to Kay's for the quality service I received.

name: B Schjott
text: My daughter ordered a heart beat necklace and ring on May 3rd, as of yesterday June 26th I received the necklace but no ring. The clasp on the necklace is broken and I can’t get any one to answer the phone at the local office.

name: Rayshundra Davis
text: Great Customer Service.  Friendly staff and willing to help anyone that comes in. They take the time to get to know you and what your needs or desires are. Whenever I've encountered an issue, they took the time to try to solve the problem.  I always feel valued when I'm there.

name: Mel Mom of 5
text: Love this place! Always get a nice friendly SMILE even when I'm just looking and wishing

name: Kimberly Nelson
text: Sent wedding ring in for cleaning, check prongs in setting and replace lost side diamond.  My ring came back on time, and it was beautiful and immaculate.  Service was great and personnel very helpful.  My Father had his watch repaired here, and he received great service also.

name: Kendall Duke
text: Was in recently and bought some earrings. Hannah is who helped us and she was very nice and knowledgeable. We had a great experience.

name: Nikki Hudson
text: I have purchased jewelry and had repairs from this location. The service was excellent. I would definitely recommend this location to anyone. Never had any problems!!

name: D Johnson
text: One of the best salesman ever, he took his time with me, he showed me exactly what I wanted to see, & answered all my questions.

name: Christina Denton
text: High quality jewelry with reasonable prices.  Friendly staff. Manager extremely helpful and patient.

name: Kaitlyn Waltman
text: My engagement ring was supposed to be sent to Virginia by a week ago, in a 6 prong setting. They haven't even started on it and it's 2 weeks later. I won't see my boyfriend again till the wedding. They ordered a 5 prong setting in white gold instead of yellow gold. They promised us again it'd be here by the 9th, we contacted them again and they said the repair shop still hasn't even gotten the part or promised to ship it. We just want the ring back. We don't even want the ring fixed by them. Kay's is awful! Do not trust them!

name: Sherri Beck
text: They sales rep was absolutely remarkable they make you feel like they have known forever and work with you with a smile even if you are undecided and take awhile to make your own choices they do not rush you or make you feel as though you are taking up their time and they work with you till you find that perfect ring that says we will lol thank you Kay Airport Blvd Bell Air Mall I love my Wedding set your staff is the best oh and it doesn't matter what your budget amount is you will leave there with what you came for and in your price range and very satisfied thanks again

name: Hope Fulton
text: I got the ring and it immediately had to be sent in for three weeks to be sized. It was sent back to me with one of the stones chipped, and then a different stone fell out of it a few weeks later. I took it in to have both stones replaced. It was gone for three weeks and was sent back to me with two stones chipped. They had to damage it out and give me a new one which was sent out for three weeks to be sized. I went to pick it up on the 'promise date' and at first they told me they lost it, but then they said it hadn't even been shipped out from their store to be sized until the day after I was supposed to pick it up. Throughout all of this Debbie has been extremely rude when I go in to the store. This whole experience has been a nightmare and I will never shop with Kay again.

name: Robert Stout
text: Sami  gives first class service

name: Heather Bankester
text:
I sent my ring off to get sized. They said it would take 10 days and would be due back April 23. I called that morning and they proceed to tell me they do not get shipments on the weekends, but it should be here Monday. So I called again Monday morning and they told me the sizing company was running behind and it wouldn't be here until Wednesday!
Now, I'm due to leave out of town for 10 days and I will not have my engagement ring! I am very disappointed.

name: Lee Will
text: Kay Jewelers is the best😊👍

name: Charles Moseley
text: Great service!  People are friendly.  Ms. Peavey, thank you.

name: Edward Moseley
text: Found a citizen blue angels watch they wanted 700 for on Amazon for 386 way to high mark up on product

name: Trayce Franklin
text: The sales rep was very polite and profesional

name: San Richards
text: Great staff and quality jewelry

name: Nicole Wimpee
text: Nice and friendly staff.

name: GROWN MAN BUSINESS
text: Calling this Location during business hours is a waste of time, they won't answer!

name: Annie Smith
text: Awesome no waiting

name: sami shakir
text: Great service

name: Margie Francis
text: Excellent

name: Florida Food Review
text: They are AWESOME and have been a staple of the Mobile area for SO LONG!  You can trust this HOMETOWN JEWELER to take care of your needs! Great customer service and selections.

name: Kelly Sesco
text: Sadly Claude Moore Jeweler has closed after being in business for over 90 years.  It was a landmark of Mobile, Alabama and they leave behind the Claude Moore clock on the corner as a reminder of their long presence here.

name: Lynne Cary
text: Sad to see them closing. Best wishes.

name: Desmond Williams
text: It was awesome 👌 and I'm coming back for my Cubans ⛓.

name: Dr.Ritchelle Broadnax,DNP,CRNP
text: This is the worst jewelry store I’ve ever come across. I bought a necklace that I wanted to be shorter. It was immediately sent off to repair to be shortened for me.  I was never able to bring the necklace home. It’s been a month. Every time repair sends it back to the store it doesn’t pass the quality inspection and is sent back. I was actually in the store for one of the instances and saw for myself that the necklace was uneven and has some discoloration. However, there is obviously a lack of skill in their repair department because they can’t seem to get this simple adjustment done. So, basically I have purchased a necklace that Zales themselves have ruined and I will never bring home. I called Corporate and they NEVER answer the phone. You’ll be listening to music and fun facts about Opals for hours. I’ll be returning to the store to simply get a refund. Worst experience ever. I should have went to Jareds.

name: Malcolm Banks
text: Came to Zales today to get the Valentine's Day special and they were sold out! I was crushed! I sat and thought for a moment and I asked Gina one of the salespeople was it possible to buy one on order and she was able to make sure that I got my order and it was sent to the right place! The customer service from everyone was outstanding!

name: James Serritelli
text: Can't even answer the phone

name: Justin Golson
text: N'Gina is the best! Always gives great advice. Made all my purchases easy and stress free!!

name: Sarah
text:
Horrible. When sizing my engagement ring, they messed up the writing that was on the underside of the band, and a diamond chip was missing.

When I called, the manager refused to replace the ring. They were nasty and horrible on the phone; I’ve never gone through such a thing. They ruined my ring and refused angrily to fix it.

I had to bring my DAD down there with me in person to demand a new ring. They were intimidated into doing it.

As soon as I got my new ring, one of the 3 main diamonds fell out.

I will never go to Zale’s ever again, not even if I were on fire and they had water. What a joke. Nasty people; horrible merchandise. My diamonds probably aren’t even real.

text:
Also had a terrible experience.  Not worth the price, not worth the time, and they will LIE to you to get you to buy from here.  Bought an engagement ring from here, paid half up front, said that I would pay the other half when I get back into the country (just in case she declined the proposal).  Well, when I got back and paid it off, they had already sent a mispayment to my credit history and LIED AGAIN, saying that they would erase it from there.  They put me down for a payment plan, of which I didn't want, because I WAS OUTSIDE OF THE COUNTRY.  If I pay half, and say I'm going to pay the other half in three months, that's what I'm going to do.

Any business that promotes this kind of lying deserves to shut down.

They helped educate me on how to clean it.  So glad I know how to properly clean my jewelry in the safety of my home! So willing to go above and beyond!!! text: I absolutely love this location! They work hard to build a relationship with you and get to know your needs and wants. They are consistently kind and attentive.

name: andrew runge
text: Awesome customer service. My wife’s wedding band lost a diamond recently so we took it to Kay’s to get fixed. They had to mail the ring off and it was back at their store fixed in no time. I’m currently working 6 days a week so Sunday is our only day to get stuff done. We drove to Kay’s (about 45 minutes) to find out they were closed do to a busted water pipe. I sent Adrienne an email and within 30-40 minutes she was at the the store to meet me and give us the ring. Couldn’t ask for better service!

name: william norris
text: I would like to start that I have never left a review for any business I have ever used. This experience has been an exception. I ordered a wedding ring on November 11th and it was scheduled to arrive on November 22. We check in several times up through December 11th and the order had not arrived. This was fine because our wedding is not until February 6th. In mid December, the store manager, Adrienne, realized that the ring had mistakenly been shipped to Oklahoma. I understand there are a lot of shipping issues at the moment so I completely understood. On December  23rd, I called and was told by the store manager that the best direction to go would be to do a completely new order and that is would be scheduled to arrive in mid January. For a wedding on February 6th, a mid January shipment was cutting it too close for comfort considering our experience to this point. Hopefully canceling the order and getting my money back will be a better experience. Unfortunately, I could not recommend purchasing a blow pop from this store.

name: Erin Putter (Chasing Life's Adventure)
text: Refused to help. I understand that we are dealing with COVID and all but this location is keeping the doors locked and makes you wait outside until they see you. I went there with the intent to get my wedding rings sent off for sizing and soldering. Was told I needed an appointment. No one was in the store and I asked to simply give her my rings and wait for the paperwork outside. Was told no. What is so precious in a jewelry store that they have to be on a near lockdown status but I can go nearly anywhere else at this point? I wonder why they don’t just close the store for the duration so they can stop paying people to do nothing.

name: Caesar How
text: The manager is awesome and always there and her staff rocks. Her commitment to service keeps me coming back. Every business needs someone like her for sustainability and image. She is a true gem for Kay and I will continue to come back as long as she is there.

text: I purchased a beautiful diamond ring that was so awesome.  My sales person was so great to work with.  Jeron is very patient as it's not easy to pick from such an amazing collection of beautiful jewelry.  I also had my weeding ring that was set in gold set in silver and I am so happy.  Love it!  Go shopping and ask for Jeron and be well served and satisfied with great prices and awesome selection!!

text: Almost the whole staff are jewellers not pressure salesperson.  I have found the only jewelry  store i like to visit. Next to a craftsman shop i know in hong kong. They can create some great items at Lons

name: Megan Miller
text:
My husband and I went to pick out our wedding bands at Grogan Jewelers. I also was looking to get my grandmother's ring, which I was given as my engagement ring, resized and cleaned up. I was also told it needed to be fixed, as some of the prongs holding the diamond in were coming loose.

I was told it could take anywhere from 1-4 weeks for the bands, and the ring, well, the jeweler will be back on Tuesday to give you a quote on a cost. To his credit, the jeweler was wonderful. I got my quote and was told it would probably be ready by Monday.

Monday rolls around and it's not ready but that's okay. I understand delays happen, and it's not like I need the ring right this minute. I say thanks and on goes my day.. The next day I get a similar phonecall, but it's still fine, I get it.

The third day past due, my husband gets a call that the rings are ready and they're ready for pick up. He asks if it's all three. "Three? Um, there's only two." No, there are two bands and an engagement ring. "No, I only see two bands here. I don't see any engagement rings here. Let me look for the order I'll call you back."

So he looks. And he can't find it. Calls back. Some stern words are had regarding the fact that yes, we dropped of a ring for repairs and it should be there.

Keep in mind, this is my grandmother's ring. She is deceased. I have no words for how upset I was during this whole exchange.

Eventually they call back. They found it. The order should be complete "tomorrow"

No phone call that next day.

The following day I called back and was told yes, two rings are here for you.

I swear, I think I blacked out for a second.

Grogan, get your act together before you give someone a heart attack.

To the jeweler's credit, the ring fits great and looks amazing. The rest of you all can go get some training in how to deliver customer service without taking years off people's lives.

name: Jeffrey Marquie
text:
I purchased rings here and could not be more pleased.  I worked with Jeron Tidwell and he was extremely knowledgeable and helpful.  I was very unsure of what I wanted and Jeron patiently guided me through the process from sizing, selecting the materials to advising on the best delivery methods since I live out of town.
If you are looking at any fine jewelry purchases in the near future, I highly recommend this store and Jeron specifically.  He definitely went the extra mile for me with my purchase even calling to follow up several weeks later.  If I could give this store 6 stars I would!  I am very satisfied!

name: Victoria Brady
text: We went in to have something engraved and to buy a piece of jewelry for our new grandaughter.  We asked to talk with the engraver and looked at a child's bracelet while we waited. . He never came out and no one spoke to us at all. After being totally ignored by all staff members for about 20 minutes we left. I will shop somewhere else where my business is appreciated.

resp.text: Mrs. Brady I am so very sorry that you were unhappy with our in ability to get to you sooner. I apologize for that, but we were very busy when you were in the store. The engraver was already out front with a customer that arrived prior to you. When the engraver finished with the customer he was waiting on, he asked who was requesting him and you had already left. He was giving the prior customer the same attention that he was hoping to give you. We did have a shortage of staff today due to illness, I apologize. I am also sorry that you did not realize he was helping someone else, I am sure you would have understood had you realized such.  Congratulations on the arrival of your new granddaughter that is such a blessing! Again, I am sorry that our engraver could not get to you sooner. I am happy to talk with you by phone as I am hurt that you left feeling unappreciated, as that is never our desire! Please call 334-365-6552 and ask for Lynn.

text: Beautiful store and fantastic experience! As always it is a pleasure working with Bryan Jewelry. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. I highly reccomend them for all your jewelry needs!

text: Found a nice piece of jewelry as a birthday gift, and was very impressed by the courteousness and friendly sales attitude! My salesman was Randy,you guys should come by and see him! I will definitely be back and he has vast knowledge of all things jewelry!

text: I had a great experience working with the professional and friendly staff at Bryan Jewelry! I highly recommend them and look forward to working with them again in the future!

name: JarHead
text: After I asked a few to many questions they started ignoring me.  To high of prices for my taste.  Better deals else where.

resp.text: Ernie, thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. We strive to provide all of our customers with the best customer service and quality product. Please get in touch with us on 334-365-6552 and we'd be happy to help you out.

text: Great customer service, quick jewelry repair, great work!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind, kind words. We appreciate you taking time for this review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Gisette Greene
text: While I love the ring my husband picked out, I have to say this was one of the most unpleasant experiences I’ve ever had in a retail environment. I usually don’t like to post negative reviews but after hearing from multiple people that they experienced the same from here I felt I should. I instantly felt uncomfortable when I walked in. My husband had purchased my ring and I brought it in to get resized. That was my first visit and it was okay. They said to give them at least 5 days but I should receive it back sooner. 2 days later and they called back! I was thrilled! I was surprised how quickly the turnaround was. I left but the ring was too snug. I brought it back and the entire time the young lady was assisting me she seemed like I was a nuisance. Very unpleasant and I just couldn’t wait to get the heck out of there. Again, they had a very quick turnaround and when I walked in not one word was said to me. I walked up and I almost spoke first but I wanted to see how long this would last. FIVE employees there and not one spoke a word to me. When I got up to the counter still nothing was said. She handed me my rings and finally asked how they fit. Thankfully they fit perfectly and I never have to set foot in there again. Absolutely horrible service.

resp.text: We work hard to make all feel welcome and to provide excellent service. I sounds like we failed you and I am sorry! I do hope you will give us an opportunity to help you in the future. This will give us an opportunity to review all procedures. If you would like to speak to me in person, please come by or call 334-365-6552.

name: Hahna Burney
text: Fantastic customer service. Do yourself a favor and visit!!!!!

resp.text: You do us an honor, thank you!

name: Andrea Williams
text: I called this morning,  then decided to go in to have some engravings done. Everyone was so nice, helpful, as well as professional! I needed the engravings in connection to a birthday gift, and needed it done extremely last minute! I called several other places beforehand and was pretty much told by everyone that it was impossible to get done in the timeframe for which I needed it, and I even offered to pay a fee in order to have it rushed. The person I spoke with said that not only could they get it done within my timeframe, but also they would not charge me a fee for doing so. I thought it would take at least a day and a half, but Justin got it taken care of in just a couple hours for me. I really loved his work, and the pieces looked beautiful! I was really made to feel like I was an important customer,  and that my business was truly appreciated. I was very impressed by the pregnant lady as well as Justin, and I will definitely be recommending Brian jewelry in the future. Additionally, it will be my go to store for jewelry purchases and needs from here on out.

resp.text: Andrea, we are so happy you felt welcome and appreciated in our store! That is our great desire. We are so pleased you allowed us to help you make your birthday celebration be enhanced by our services. Also thank you for giving Justin and Kendall a shout out. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Jenny Whisenhunt
text: The amazing, creative, and lovely staff was able to work with me to design a new ring using materials from one of my late grandmother's and one of my old rings. They helped me to combine the stones of the two older ones into a new piece that is simply stunning and unique. I will definitely return.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to work with you!

We've been trusted her with our precious family heirlooms and we will continue to go to Bryan Jewelry as Lynn her staff have our own wavering respect in confidence.

text: Did business with Bryan Jewelry for the first time this week. We could not have been happier working with Lynn. Top notch service, quality and value. They have a large selection and work with you to get you exactly what you want. Highly recommend!

name: Roscoe
text: This is NOT the place to try and sell Gold at.  They offer far less than current value. Re reply: What a bunch of jokers "All of our offers are fair and honest"  Fair offer it was not.  Everyone else pays within $10 of current spot values. Crazy.

resp.text: For over 63 years Bryan Jewelry has been one of the most trusted names in jewelry in the Prattville region. While we do buy Gold, we must inspect any and all products before we purchase them, upon looking at your product it was concluded that you had bullion. For your bullion we offered 75%, which was disclosed to you before the offer was made.  For any customer we will make an offer and it's up to the customer to make the decision to sell. All of our offers are fair and honest. It is with this policy coupled with our years of experience and services that have built a legacy of integrity and trust with our customers.

text: Don't go here to get any work done if you expect them to tell you the truth..

resp.text:
Jon,

We also appreciate feedback from our customers on every level. We've extensively checked our database and have no record of a client by your name. For over 63 years Bryan Jewelry has been one of the most trusted names in jewelry in the Prattville region. We ask that if there was truly an issue with the service you received from our company that you call and / or visit the store directly and ask to speak to the Owner Lynn. Thank you

name: Jennifer Flores
text: I had a great experience working with the staff at Ware Jewelers at Eastchase last week. I appreciated the team work and hospitality they extended to us. They are very knowledgeable and provide excellent customer service! Please visit them for your next jewelry or watch purchase!

name: Maureen Montgomery
text: Awesome staff and so easy to work with! We will be back.

name: John Hartman
text: Cheri and the team at Ware Jewelers are amazing! Their customer service and attention to detail is what really sets them apart. In need of a beautiful piece of jewelry for that special occasion? Have a family heirloom in need of repair? Do yourself a favor and go to Ware Jewelers, you'll be glad you did!

name: John Franklin
text: Excellent service and quality. I had ordered a signet ring for my daughter from another store and they totally messed up. They had 2 months to complete the order and told me a week before my daughters birthday the ring would be another 2 weeks. So, I went to Wares Jewelers in Eastchase and Cheri found me what I wanted and it was ready in 2 days. Totally professional, thank you Cheri and Wares Jewelers for coming through.

name: Chrissy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Carol Roberts
text: Ware Jewelers is one of the few places locally you can take a Rolex for factory approved service. I believe they send the watches to their Auburn location and they are serviced there. They are also a Rolex retailer so you can buy the brand there. I have taken two rings to be sized but unfortunately they charge for sizing based on how many stones are in the ring and it gets really expensive for just a tiny adjustment. That said, I believe them to be a reliable and trustworthy jeweler.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words, Carol!  You are correct, our CW21 watchmaker in Auburn handles many of our Rolex repairs in house, although we always keep channels open to send watches directly to Rolex in the event that is determined to be necessary or a faster turnaround for you.

I absolutely understand your concern about how our sizing is priced, so I want to help you understand why we have to take the number of stones into account.  Whenever a jeweler sizes a ring, they then have to follow up on their work by checking each individual stone and tightening it, which can become very labor intensive when you are dealing with rings that have a large number of tightly spaced stones down the shoulder and onto the shank.  When it's all said and done, our objective is to make sure that when you get your ring back, you can wear it with full confidence that everything will remain where it belongs, from the ring on your finger down to the smallest stone on the shank.

Again, thank you so much, and I hope that helps clarify our policies a bit for you!

name: John Davis
text: I have exclusively shopped at the Eastchase Ware for all of my jewelry needs for the past 7 years. Their staff is very knowledgable and are always willing to take the time in order to assist me in finding the perfect gift. In fact, it is this personable approach that keeps me coming back. A typical "chain" jewelry store, they are not. The family owned atmosphere is proudly displayed as they are more concerned with what jewelry best fits my needs rather than what jewelry they want to sale. I guess that is really what makes Ware the place I want to shop...I am dealing with an individual who wants to assist me in my jewelry purchase as opposed to a sales person.

resp.text: Thank you very much, John!  It means everything to us to know that you've been treated so well, and have entrusted us with your loyalty as a result.  That's the sort of ethic that's kept us in business for the past 70 years, we always want to make sure that you are happy with every part of your experience when you come to visit us.

name: Leigh Quinney
text: Allison and Cheri have helped me refurbish family pieces, design custom pieces and choose new items over the years.  I would never trust anyone else to help make such special purchases and important decisions. Love them!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Leigh!  Allison and Cheri are both amazingly dedicated to their clients, and I'm glad you've had such a wonderful, long-standing relationship with them!

name: Andi Lee
text: My favorite local jewelry store. Everytime I'm in the store, I feel very welcome. Plus the service is good too. I bent my ring and I was so nervous that I would have to pay a lot to get it fixed. But I took it to them and it was barely 2 minutes before I had my ring back in excellent condition for free. It wasn't perfect, but it gave me peace of mind. He did warn me there would be a chance of it breaking, but luckily it didn't. And it wasn't even a ring from the store. I was so pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Andi!  I'm glad we were able to help put your ring straight.  As you've discovered, we're always happy to take a look and see if we can help, regardless of whether your jewelry came from us or not.  There is very little we can't work on.

name: Mark Free
text: I would follow Cheri Jordan anywhere she goes.   She is the most knowledgeable in the market place......and always a joy to work with.   Ware Jewelers is lucky to have her........Customer Service is always tops at Ware

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mark!  I completely agree, Cheri is one of a kind and we are so lucky to have her as part of our family here!

name: Dancing Llamas
text: It was wonderful. Chris and and all the staff have been helpful and very polite. Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Fred!  We appreciate your feedback!

name: Raquel Anecito
text: Alexandra is an amazing sales person. She took care of all my needs. I recommend her next time you go.

resp.text: Thank you, Raquel!  Alexandra's one of the newest members of the Ware family, but she's settled in fast and we're expecting great things from her!

name: Cherie Dunn
text: I absolutely love the engagement ring my husband got at Wares. Thelma is wonderful and always remembers us when we go in the store!!

name: Mary Anne Perkovich
text: Super friendly and knowledgeable staff! They are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure their customers are happy!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mary Anne!  We're always striving to make sure everyone who comes through our doors is treated like family!

name: Holly Butler

name: Cristin JOSHUA

resp.text: Thank you very much, Cristin!  We do pride ourselves on not just helping our customers find what they want, but also helping them to understand exactly what they're getting by explaining all the terms and ratings used in fine jewelry, and how that applies to their individual piece.

name: Angela Louviere
text:
While sharing time between my two sons and their activities this weekend, I made it a point to visit the store. My son will receive a Rolex watch for his upcoming college graduation. While he is very opinionated about the watch that he would like, I wanted to make sure that it wouldn’t be too big. Upon arriving, DeeDee greeted me with warmth and a friendly smile. She gladly showed me a Rolex to help me understand the sizing. My son met me a few minutes later.  He was very pleased to be able to try on a few watches and discuss the differences with DeeDee. He also told us that he didn’t think that he could try them on because earlier in the day, Thelma refused to show him and his dad any. I was very surprised to learn this since I had just encountered a great salesperson who was so helpful.
I didn’t even know that they had gone shopping! They were doing research too.
DeeDee has me considering a Rolex for myself (though I do love my Breitling!) and I will definitely want to work with her again.
Upon leaving, my son told me that Thelma wouldn’t even discuss the Deep Sea with them. She simply replied, ‘There’s a waiting list for those.’ He was very glad that he returned this evening and I’m so glad that he met me at the store and had a great experience instead of dismissing them all together. I hope to return soon and be able to purchase his watch (or maybe mine!!) and it will definitely be with DeeDee!

name: noel crenshaw
text: Alexander anecito is amazing I got everything taken care of that I needed to take care of for my wedding set

text: My sister and I brought in several pieces of pearl jewelry that had belonged to our mother. We wanted to repurpose the pieces into pieces that we thought would appeal to my daughters and my sister’s daughter-in-law. Emily met with us and listened to all we had to say about the styles we were looking for. Together we came up with designs that we thought each of the girls would like. When we went to pick them up, she had not made the final piece. After looking at all the others she felt that the design of the design of last piece was not comparable to the others and she feared we would not be satisfied. She had a new design drawn up for us to consider.  She was absolutely right; the original design needed the changes she made. We appreciate that she cared enough to wait on that last piece. As it turned out, that design became my favorite. Emily truly created beautiful pieces that we feel reflect the personalities of each girl.  There is no way our experience could not have been improved upon.

They even polished it up to where it looked better than it ever has. All of the women that work there are very friendly and helpful. I'll definitely go back again for all of my jewelry needs. I highly recommend them!

text: I walked into this store with my daughter looking for a certain item. The line is no longer carried, but I was directed to other items that were perfect for what I was looking for. I asked my daughter if that was what she wanted Santa to bring and the kind lady kept it going. When the item arrived in the store, she called and said Santa delivered an item. I was impressed she remembered after all the people she’s helped during that week. She was not available when I arrived at the store, but everyone was extremely friendly and helpful while I was in the store. I ended up buying another item while I was there and I left completely satisfied with the service I received. I would definitely recommend this store to others for the spectacular customer service.

name: Colleen Mccann
text: Jo and all of the staff at Ware Jewelers in the Tiger Town location are so sweet! They clean my jewelry while I was there and have an amazing selection of fine jewelry and gifts.

name: Kay McClain
text: What an amazing store with amazing service. I cannot say enough about the service. They have a wonderful selection of jewelry, china, and gifts. However, if you can't locate what you need that is not very helpful. The folks that work there are so familiar with the inventory that you can just describe something and they appear with it. They remember their clients and send emails when items arrive that might be of interest. I have gotten reminders of sales and the items on sale that would interest me. They have special ordered pieces of jewelry for me to my delight. Their watch repairs service is also excellent. If I need a gift, I can find something there! It is far more than a jewelry store. I can't say enough about all the services available and the helpful staff!

resp.text: Thank you, Kay!  We really do try to go the extra mile, and it's wonderful to know how appreciated that is.

name: John Dennett
text: Outstanding service with a pleasant and professional staff!

name: Rootietoot Toot
text: They were very helpful. I had some rings resized and they did a perfect job, even cleaned and polished them!

name: Owen Smith
text: Wares Jewelry cares about their customers.  Not only are they professional, they are prompt and efficient.  Their many years of serving the Lee County area is proof of their continued commitment of satisfaction.

name: Jerry Robison

name: David Whitten
text: It has been my experience that whatever in the line of jewelry I want or need, Ware Jewelers is the place to go.  I have lived and worked in Auburn for fifty years and one of the first people I met when moving here in 1968 was Lamar Ware.  He was a man of character who established his business to reflect his high standards.  Lamar is gone but his family maintains the high standards that he put into place years ago.  I am leaving Alabama and regret leaving behind a firm that I could always depend on.

David,
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated!  We are always just a phone call or email away !  Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

Pludie,
Good Morning! We do not show a transaction under your name. We can engrave coins. Please call Ronnie Ware at Ware Jewelers in Auburn Alabama 334-821-7375

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring and it fell out. The list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! Also, If you get your pearls restrung there, they take them out of the store and they go to “Jo’s home, “ which is just totally unprofessional on every level.

The lovely ladies at the Tiger Town location took great care of my repair job. I needed to have a ring sized correctly after a previous Jeweler had botched the job. It took me 3 months at the other place to get my ring back and it was wrong, but it only took me 3 days to get the correct size at Ware. Their Jeweler is awesome, and their staff is stellar.
UPDATE: once again the lady jeweler at Tiger Town location saves the day by sizing up my granddaughter's new ring in record fast time. Thanks Ms. Robin, it looks beautiful.

name: Cody B Van Houten
text: I have been shopping at Ware Jewelers all my life. As have my parents, and grandparents did. I trust no one else with my jewelry needs. Whether it be purchasing new pieces or servicing prior purchases, or maintaining my families jewelry. I trust no one else.

name: Ouida Webb
text:
Happiness is a gift box from Ware Jewelers!! Sometimes, the smallest boxes have the best surprises!!
Seriously, I love shopping at Wares. The stores are beautiful and so is their inventory. Customer service has always been awesome, regardless of whether I'm just browsing to ooh and ahh or shopping with a purpose! I enjoy every unique piece of jewelry I've purchased as well as items for my home. It is always easy to find a gift for someone, and my daughters get just as excited as I do when receiving a box wrapped in Ware's gift wrap!  I've shopped at Ware Jewelers for almost 40 years and look forward to 40 more!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ouida!  We love hearing about families that come to us across entire generations.  It really helps remind us of our own family ties, and how deep our roots are in the community!

name: Stephanie Randall
text: Repaired my rings so beautifully  they look brand new! Friendly staff and excellent customer service! Would recommend  to everyone!

name: Patti G. Reaves
text:
Went in the Tiger Town location to have a battery replaced in my watch. The young lady, Maddie, that helped me was very kind and courteous.
The reason for only 3 stars....it took a week for them to replace the battery.

name: Allen Lott
text:
Wife lost ear ring. Called Jo and explained situation. Birthday was in 10 days and I wanted a setting and diamond to match.
They came through and thier in house jeweler
Did a great job.

name: Sara Lee
text: Great workmanship on soldering my rings together and wonderful customer service!

name: Evelyn Mickle
text: Very helpful  staff,  good evaluation, price for repair reasonable,  quick service great work  very happy. With results

name: Tiffany Cole
text:
I had to have a set of pearls restrung for a second time.  The service was fabulous and she worked to find a way that would not cost me as much as it did the first time but will also provide greater strength in hopes of not breaking again.

The employees were friendly and professional!

name: Courtney Dios
text: Provided exceptional help with finding the perfect wedding ring and band for my husband. They were patient and willing to work with you until you found the perfect setting and diamonds. Would highly recommend their services as they were the best around Auburn hands down.

resp.text: Thank you, Courtney!  That's exactly the experience we hope people have when they come to see us, regardless of what they're looking for (but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a bit sentimental about engagement rings and wedding bands).

name: Rhonda Beadles
text: I had my watch band adjusted. Ware Jewelers is always my go to jewelry store. While I was there I found a gift for my first grandchild coming in December. They wrapped it beautifully for no extra charge. I love shopping there!!

name: JULIAN WHITTEN
text: Jennifer Chastain was most helpful and a pleasure to work with.

name: Patricia Frazier
text: The staff was friendly and very professional when I was looking for diamond earrings for my daughters birthday. She absolutely loves them and I will definitely visit this location and staff again for my jewelry needs.

name: Brooke Perkins
text: Always had great experiences working with Ware Jewelers. This is a great honorable company and has wonderful employees. Jo and Robin at the Tigertown location are the ladies I do most of me business with, but everyone there is pleasant and ready to help you with all your jewelry needs. Go see them. You will NOT be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you, Brooke!  Jo and Robin really do head up an amazing store over at Tiger Town, and it's always good to know people are having wonderful experiences working with them day in and day out!

name: Linda Jordan
text: Well pleased with the work done on my Rolex.Thank you!

name: Stephanie Wilbanks
text: This place is awesome. They were so helpful and patient with me when I changed my mind 200 times. They finally found me the perfect ring! I couldn't be happier!

name: Judy Miller
text: Robin was so helpful and offered suggestions without being pushy. She repaired my engagement ring and had it ready to pick up in one day! Thanks to her expert cleaning, my rings look new and my diamond is sparkling!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judy!  We're very lucky to have Robin here with us, and are thrilled to hear she took such good care of you!

name: Rodney Moore
text: Overall experience was pleasant. Robin helped with a bracelet purchase and provided her usual excellent service. Those who assisted with paperwork and pickup were cheerful and a pleasure to interact with.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Rodney!  We count ourselves very lucky to have Robin with us, and we're glad to hear she and the rest of the staff take such good care of you.

name: Cheryl Stevenson
text: The Jewelers were extremely professional, helpful, and provided a quality product with which I am completely satisfied!

name: Steve Lock
text: Wares is always wonderful to work with!!  Friendly, professional staff!!  Very knowledgeable!!  Would recommend to everyone!!

name: Erik Van Slyke
text: The custom pendant made by Emily was gorgeous!  And the staff was always warm, welcoming and very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. Very much appreciated.

name: K P
text: My engagement ring is amazing! They helped my husband so much with choosing a diamond and creating my ring. The quality at Ware's is so much better than other stores and I would never trust my jewelery to anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you Katie!  We're thrilled that you love your ring so much!

name: Taylor Swann
text: Ware Jewelers has always been my family's jewelers since before I was born! I have always received the best customer service each time I shop, and always end up with such beautiful jewelry! I highly recommend Ware Jewelers!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Taylor!  It is always humbling to be reminded of how many people have been shopping with us across entire generations of their families.  Thank you for letting us be there for you!

name: Gita Smith
text:
I look for two things when I shop for jewelry, and Ware Jewelers has them both.
The first is top quality merchandise because it is important to know that craftsmanship and materials will last a lifetime.
The second is a personal relationship with the store staff. They understand my tastes and they do not try to push me towards something just for the sake of a quick sale. If I visit Ware, I might ask to see three or four pieces and buy nothing at the moment. Nevertheless, they are always gracious.
Gita Smith

resp.text: Thank you, Gita.  We strive to carry the finest brands for our customers, but I think you really hit it on the head with your assessment of the relationships we strive to build.  We believe that our job isn't done right unless you're happy; it's always about much more than just a sale.

name: Jeannie Railey
text: Jo Harper helped us threw the process of my wedding band...We liked our service so much we purchased a crystal canister for our sand ceremony and our cake plate from wares .. She went above and beyond to make sure we were happy..She was at the one Auburn offices at the time..I'd use wares again if I ever wanted to purchase jewelry..

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jeannie!  Jo has been such an amazing credit to the Ware family, we're lucky to have her and so pleased she took such good care of you!

name: J D HARRIS
text: Great service and sales. No pressure to purchase.

name: Quentin Padgett
text: Excellent service and product knowledge. Staff is always friendly. Best manager ever!

name: Richard Prather
text: Lindsey always remembers me by name and is very helpful and courteous!  Couldn't ask for better customer service which is very refreshing when it's virtually non-existent in today's retail market!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Richard!  It's always our goal to make sure that your needs are foremost in our considerations.

name: Lucas Kerby
text: Joe is extremely knowledgeable about all products Wares offers. She is an amazing representative for Wares. I will be shopping here again.

resp.text: Thank you, Lucas!  Jo really is amazing, and we're lucky to have her!

name: Susan Hughley
text: Ward's Jewelers is the best place to shop for all your wedding gifts and jewelry.  I MET JOE AT the Village Mall...and she is still the Best!!!!!.the customer service is out standing.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susan!  Jo really is great, and we're glad she's been taking such good care of you!

name: Renee Folk
text: Love this store and one of managers Jo has been the most helpful. We will continue to buy Pandora,Auburn jewelry and other great gifts Love,Love,Love❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you Miste!  Jo's a really amazing person, and we're so glad you've made that connection with her.

name: Heather Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice and easy to work with. Jennifer did a great job helping us select the perfect rings for our wedding!

Ariel spent about 30-40 minutes with me while I decided on a 25 year anniversary ring. It was reassuring to know I made the correct decision with their input.

Jamie Bradfield
LaGrange, GA

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jamie!  25 years is something to celebrate, and we're glad Ariel and the rest of our Tiger Town staff could help you bring your own plans to fruition.  Congratulations!

name: Jackie Young

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Jackie!  We're glad we were able to get that back to you so quickly!

TigerTown is a great
