name: Steve Brown
text: Was looking to trade in a old ring I had purchased from Kay to bring down the cost. Found the ring I wanted in the store and decided to think about it. After leaving checked Kay's website and found the same ring for the same cost without trading in my ring. First thing came to mind was "You Croaks". I almost gave you "CROAKS" my ring for nothing. BUYERS BEWARE THIS IS WHAT IT HAS COME TO.

name: Deanna Salazar
text: My husband wanting to surprise me for Christmas this year 2020 and doing so we went to Kay in Decatur on the 24th of December. We got there and he purchase me a beautiful ring-! The young lady Jasmine was working and was helping us to decide and making this the best experience ever-! With the holidays here Jasmine told us it would take about 2 plus weeks for it to be returned. I went into the storr tonight just to see if my ring was back and to my surprise it was-! With the holidays and everything it did take the 2 weeks-! Jasmine and the other young lady that night (Diana) was wonderful-! Jasmine tonight was wonderfule-! I recommend them to anyone-! Thanks again Jasmine

name: Sarah Blakely
text: I went to Google to get the store's number and saw the last 2 reviews and had to say something! We will be calling corporate as well! We NEVER go to the Decatur location, because of past experiences,  but recently we had a wedding to attend in town and stopped in. Jessica, the store Manager, was INCREDIBLE.  I had dreaded walking in and she immediately made us feel at home. The reason I am leaving a review is because not only was the man claiming a dispute with his credit company in there and behaving like an absolute juvenile, I fully believe the call she received from who I gathered (from eavesdropping tbh) was corporate was in regards to the man on here complaining about "an order." First of all, I am a retail manager as well. If I gave a return on a machine we sent somewhere for maintenance I would lose my job.  The man acted like a baby, and my husband was irate that a grown man should behave that way. The manager, though, was nothing less than professional,  and dealt with it better than I would have for sure! Secondly,  when I listened to her phone conversation about pendant man,  Jessica said more than once but shouldn't we do something for him, they hadn't found out if they could yet (or something like that.) All I thought that day was wow, people are so rude, and it's not even their fault. I never thought I would recommend the Decatur store, but 100% I recommend to everyone! The staff is nice, I actually trust them for once, and the manager Jessica is clearly willing to go above and beyond to try to help you even when you act like a total jerk to her. I admit even I kinda did at first, I just expected the kind of service that caused us to stop going there. Jessica if you see this, you have customers for life - The Blakely Family

name: corey house
text: Dishonest, no Integrity, and their word means nothing. Bought diamond earrings from Decatur, Al store and thought ordered custom diamond picture pendant to match earrings. After several assurances the piece could be made kay finally told me the piece couldn't be made but would not take earrings back because 30 day window passed for refund but it passed because I was waiting on pendant to be made. I did inform kay in beginning that I was getting earrings and pendant as set. They finally told me custom order was never put in is the reason for no refund which wasnt my fault. I don't work for kay and I don't know the protocol  but the store manager took my order or at least I thought and once they couldn't deliver they used a technicality to keep my money. They dont have the best merchandise anyway but make sure you cross your t's and dot your i's when dealing with them.

name: Chasity Warren
text: I had went to two different jewelers to order my daughter a class ring and no one seemed to care to help, just told to go online. I did not know her size and she was with me but no one seemed to want to help. Walked into Kay jewelers on 6th ave and it was totally different. They were super friendly and there’s was also online but she pulled it up and ordered it with me there and sized my daughter. We received it today and went in to pick up and love it and also the same friendliness. Thank you for being good at what you do!

name: Amanda Lambert
text: Me and my husband were at Kay Jewelers tonight. The gentleman that helped us was very pleasant. We had a great experience picking out my valentine’s present.

name: Paul Eichwurtzle
text: Friendly, thorough, professional service. Reasonable pricing.

name: Midnight_Rider 2020
text: Good and pretty jewelry

name: Jo Dumas
text: Bought a pocket watch for my son in law for his graduation from the police academy. Took it back there 2 times to have it engraved. They couldn't find the engraving paperwork both times. Thought since I purchased it there it wouldn't be a problem to have it engraved.Will be taking it somewhere else. Very unprofessional staff.

name: Ashlie Richie
text: I took my husbands wedding ring in to be sized and they told us to come back in two weeks to pick it up. When we got there to get his ring they couldn’t find it and asked us if we were sure it was this store that we used. Then they finally found it and the bag it was in had giant red writing on it that said “Have Not Paid”. I explained to the lady that when I bought the ring I also bought the warranty and that when they found us in the system two weeks prior that they said because I bought that we would not have to pay for it to be sized. She looked us up in the system and could not find us again. When we came in the first time they had trouble finding me in the system and the same lady took all my information and said she would update me in the computer so we would not have to go through all of that again. When I explained that, she laughed and said “Oh that was me haha I didn’t do it.” So they spend like 20 minutes just trying to find us in the computer and then acted like they didn’t want to give us our ring once they found us. We found out after we left that after all of that they did not even size it!! We definitely will NOT be coming back here.

name: Michael R
text: Gary, the manager, assured me my ring would be in the month before my wedding, and told me if he was ever out of the store his co-manager Cristy would take care of me. Nobody followed up with me regarding the ring or informed me they would not have it by the date we needed it. A week before the wedding date I called up to the store and was told Gary was out of town so I left my name and number and asked to have Cristy call me. No response. Two days later I called and again asked for Cristy by name. The girl came back to the phone and said Cristy did not call me back because Gary knew about my account, not her. She didn't take my call. We did not have a ring on the wedding date, we couldn't even talk to anybody who knew the status. I finally received the ring, well past the wedding date, about twice as long as Gary told me it would take. Gary repeatedly blamed the shop for not having or knowing about my ring. When I picked up the ring I told Gary they dropped the ball and I felt like they should adjust the price of the ring - or do something to make it right. Gary looked me in the eyes and told me "I will go to bat for you" in regards to making it right, he said he would contact me in a few days. After a month I called Gary back today to ask for his district managers number, in hopes of finally getting a resolution. Gary said to me, "I thought we were done when you picked up your ring". A far cry from going to bat for me like he said he would. I feel like Gary intentionally lied to me to get rid of me. I closed my account and wont do business with Kay or Gary or Cristy again.

name: Zach Richie
text: Not good service. Didnt believe we bought my wedding band there even though it was in the computer. Took it to get sized and it was never sized. The woman claimed we didn't have warranty on the ring and almost refused to give it to me. They finally found it in the computer and saying it wasn't purchased there and they pulled it up 2 weeks before hand. Will take my business elsewhere.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Ever since the store changed locations and employees the only kiss that begins with this Kay's is kiss customer appreciation and service goodbye.

name: farrah derusseaux
text: Awesome, Excellent Customer Service

name: Landon Smith
text: Love the staff here! Very friendly and helpful.

name: Ashley Kirby
text: I had the worst experience ever with this store. I took my engagement ring in for its 6 month checkup and to go down a quarter of a size. They told me to come back in two weeks and it will be here. So two weeks later we go in to get it and it’s been ruined when they went to go down a half a size. Had a huge gash in it, popped out two big diamonds and a diamond on the side. We were heartbroken, they also told us that it was a discontinued ring so they couldn’t reorder another ring and to pick another ring. So I spent a couple days looking and just couldn’t find any ring that I liked. So I ended up going to the Kay’s in bridgestreet and instantly falling in love with one. Told them the situation and they were so shocked. They said they had never had a ring be sent off and be ruined at their store. They told me to tell Decatur which one I wanted and they could have it ordered. So my fiancé called Decatur asking if they could have it in my size and ordered and the girl said absolutely you can, come tomorrow and we will have it all ready for you. Well we go the next day and the girls calling all these places just to come back to me to say we can’t get your ring in a size for you so pick another ring. I was so upset. They ruined my ring, then told me the night before they could just to have me go all the way to the store to tell me no they can’t pick another one. I was so angry I ended up leaving. I later in the week went back to the bridestreet and they were so shocked with Decatur’s performance to us, they said we can absolutely get you the ring you want in the size you need and they were confused why Decatur told us we couldn’t. They told us to go into Decatur, get our ring and walk out and call customer service. So we did and the store manager himself fixed us up at bridgestreet with the ring we wanted, plus the band, the size we wanted, and ensured us it would be in two weeks in time for engagement pictures. Yesterday my ring came in, it’s absolutely perfect!! It just goes to show Decatur is very unprofessional, their workers are unskilled and the store manager not once came to handle the situation or talked to us about it even when we were two feet away from her. Decatur has forever lost my service and bridestreet will forever by my hero’s who came in and cleaned up their mess.

name: Brandi Perry
text: Sandy, the store manager, at the Decatur store, is so rude and unprefesionel. Kay lost a lot of family business because of her. She was so awful she was reported to cooperate. Sandy. Customer service is a must in retail.

name: Maurice Blumberg
text: Go to a Dana Augustine one day show, bring your stones and see what they can do in the day.

name: Jason Terry
text: Great people

name: John Zink
text: The store closed.   Weeks ago 😐

name: Mr Review
text: Employees are horrible they treated me like my service wasn’t important

name: April L. Butler
text: The team at the Kay Jewelers in Brookwood Mall were a wonderful help and so patient while designing an upgraded ring for me.  Excellent service and seemingly unlimited options for even the pickiest bride.  If we ever upgrade again, this is where I'll go, hands down!

name: Dawn Productions
text: I had a great experience there today 12/11/19 as usual. I don’t know why I even attempted to go to any other Kay’s because they don’t have anything and they will basically harass you to buy something. However, I’ve never had that experience at Brookwood. The ladies are always helpful, nice, and they don’t harass you (which is a plus, because If I feel like you’re pressuring me I will walk out and not purchase anything.) Brookwood always have a great selection of jewelry and great customer service. And I am one of those people who “wants to buy something but don’t know what” aka “the complicated, undecided shopper”. Today a young girl name Chariot helped me trade my old ring and pick a new one I wanted to give my mom for Christmas.  She was guided by the of the mangers, I didn’t get her name. But she was a cute middle age black woman. They suggested things to help me make a decision and I purchased my moms gift and actually felt good about it. (Unlike when I purchase something at other Kay’s and end up returning it LOL). Thanks for helping me today and keep up the good work. Soon you guys soon !!!

name: Jackie Carter
text: My fiancé and I loved our experience here! Great staff who were knowledgeable and helped us find the perfect ring! We will be going back!

name: JOHN MORENO
text: i alway buy from Alexis at Kay Brookwood mall! She is the best and takes the time to meet my needs or let me know what I need. She is like my personal agent, Thats how she makes everyone feel and its rare and special. If you have a need. Go there, every time.

name: Matthew Leonardi
text: By far the best customer service I have ever received, my fiance and I went to pick out our wedding bands and was warmly greater by Ms. Blevins. She was extremely nice, extremely patient, and made sure we got exactly what we wanted at a great deal. She was extremely kind so much that we offered to take her to dinner for her amazing help. Such an incredible professional atmosphere. The rest of the staff was friendly to. I highly suggest going there and asking to speak to Ms.Blevins for she will make you feel right home. They were so friendly that we stay after our purchase for about a half hour just to have conversation. IF YOU WANT PROFESSIONAL AND KIND HELP LOOK NO MORE, MS.BLEVINS IS WHO YOUR LOOKING FOR.

name: Stephen Hess
text: Always such helpful staff. Really pretty pricey but you pay for what you get.

name: Alexis Diamonds
text: Staffed with associates happy to serve you. You will enjoy your jewelry shopping experience

name: Cedric M
text: The salesperson was very nice and helpful.

name: Miguel Quiroz
text: Best place to buy jewelry.

name: Jasper Hicks
text: Excellent pricing and exceptional saleslady

name: Kimary Dickerson
text: Manager was rude and pushy. She even took a personal phone call while consulting with me...

name: Shelby Sam
text: This store has really turned around the past few months! Ask for Chris

name: Lyndsey Batista
text: I was very disappointed in the service I received from the Kay’s associates. I was there a little while ago to pick out a promise ring my boyfriend was going to purchase for me. When I entered the store I was not greeted what so ever. I stood in that store for over 15 minutes and no one had said a word to me. I can understand being busy with other customers or not realizing someone had walked in but 2 separate employees had walked past me and didn’t even acknowledge my presence. By the time an associate did assist me I was very bothered but they didn’t seem to want to assist someone that was “just looking”. The person seemed highly irritated once I told him I was just looking for a promise ring my boyfriend is buying for me. 10/10 do not recommend this store and will only be shopping at Zales or Jared’s form now on.

name: Marchello Perkins
text: Was in Kay's for 30 minutes and the lady refused to acknowledge my presence, over there playing on phone and running customers off....smh...good help hard to find. Wish I would've gotten her name, she's white and wears glasses in the Hoover's location. Just no assistance

name: Hectorsii Garcia
text: Amazing! The man that attended us today was very nice with us and payed full attention to what we wanted and helped us a lot. He was also very kind. Thank you again sir.

name: Doressa Glover
text: Great customer service the beautiful African American female was awesome. Sorry I forgot her name but she ROCKS.

name: Brigit Thomas
text: Love this store and the service is exceptional. Also, I love my ring!

name: Jonathan Saliba
text: The manager, Christie, is one of the most nicest and most professional people that you will ever meet. My wife lost and earning and I was trying to replace it. Christie went above and beyond!!! She called I am not sure where to see if they still had this type of earring and of course after 10 years from the original purchase they did not. She then called the people that make the jewelry to see if they could make the pair for me again. They could but it was at a much higher price than the original purchase. I didn’t go that route. I came back today months after talking with her about some other pieces and she helped me again. I am not sure about the other comments about the manager are all about but Christie is the reason I will continue to shop at this store. She deserves a raise and some kind of recognition for what she does everyday. I literally could have walked out and gone to one of the many other jewelers stores in the mall and probably gotten something very similar but because of her I did not. Thank you for the great customer experience.

name: amy mims
text: Christy the store manager was wonderful! Polite, professional and just precious! The bears that help St. Jude's just made me love this Kay's location that much more!!!!!

name: BOBBY EDWARDS
text:

name: Jeanetta Conner
text: I have been a Kays customer for at least 15 years. The service is normally good but that has changed with the store manager now. She is very condescending and not sympathetic to customer issues. When you have defective jewelry that you're selling as high quality, that's a problem. If I bring something back to you once because of a defect, you would think you would make sure that never happens again. So if I have to bring it back a 2nd then 3rd time, now you're wasting not only my money but my time. For the first time in over 15 years I did not feel like a valued customer at all. I will never spend another penny in this Kay's again.

text: The ladies here are always so nice.

name: Kawanna Bryant
text: The sales associate, April, was very respectful and helpful. She was attentive from the time I walked in to the time I walked out. I will definitely come here for all my jewelry needs from now on.

name: Colter C
text: I purchased a  Mother's Day present today at Kay Jewelers, and I had a pleasant and productive shopping experience.  Peggy was friendly and helpful.  Thank you!

name: Hannah Tell
text:
Go anywhere but here. Kays in general has some unethical sales practices. They WILL lie to you.

Returning the engagement ring we bought today because they told my anxiously excited BF the ring he picked was in my size (5) only to tell him after paying it was a 6 (another associate told me no ring in the store has EVER been in a 5) She just lied because she knew how badly he wanted to give me a ring now.

I plan to bring it back and tell her another kay store has it in my size just so I can hear her tell me "we never carry 5's" after that bold face lie she told my BF.

F*** Kays....they also told me id get an additional 10% off for getting a credit card, so I did even though we wanted to pay cash, only to be told right after getting approved the discount couldn't be applied. Now I'm stuck with their credit card. Seriously, just go ANYWHERE but kays. I have friends who have worked there and this is STANDARD.

name: Ashely Harrell
text: I truly want to give the ladies at the Kay Jewelers in the Riverchase Galleria Mall the biggest compliment I can. April and Christie went above and beyond with their customer service to help me with my issue and ensure all my needs were met. I had to get my wedding ring cleaned and repaired as a diamond had fell out. I sent the pieces of jewelry off mid-March and was expecting them back around early-April. My jewelry ticket consisted of one diamond in my band to be replaced, the three separate pieces sautered together, and the final ring cleaned. Upon mid-April, I did not hear from the store on the status of my ring so my husband and I went to the store in person to get an update. Ms. April informed me that the ring was being held because they wanted to make sure that I was okay with how the ring would potentially come out and discuss any pitfalls. I was informed there would be a potential gap in the ring once the pieces were sautered together. Upon me giving the okay, the ring was supposedly sent to be fixed and I continued to wait patiently. During that time, Ms. April helped me find two other LeVian rings that were on sale and that were absolutely gorgeous and suitable to wear at my job. I decided that once my other rings came back, I would get the two new rings resized for my finger. Coming into the first week of May, I discovered my ring was still not back and at this point I was getting very flustered. Ms. Christie spoke with me and ensured that she would get my ring repaired and back to me quickly and had apologized for the long wait. She personally made sure to let the jeweler know to expedite the process. When my ring finally did arrive back, the middle stone of the main ring was still cloudy, there was black residue on the ring bands, the ring was resized even smaller than my finger, and the same diamond was missing when it was presented to me. At this point I was livid, upset, and refused to do any more business with Kay Jewelers. Despite my ordeal, Ms. April and Ms. Christie showed me the greatest empathy for my situation. I was given a comforting and sorrowful hug from Ms. April. Ms. Christie personally took my ring to the jeweler and stayed with it until it was complete so that I would have the ring that same day and not have to wait any longer then I already had. In addition, she ensured that the other two rings that I recently purchased was resized that say day and back on my hand. These ladies truly exemplify the highest standard for customer service. My frustration and anger was not toward these two ladies but toward the poor service I received from the people repairing my ring. Now I do not take my ring off. Each ring or necklace I get from Kay’s is not just a piece of jewelry, but it is a story of my life. With these ladies understanding that, they will continue to earn my business from here on out.

text: They always are so helpful in finding the right Jewelry for the occasion. Core staff has been there a long time and know me

text: Did not have the same experience that others here said they did. April helped me and was very knowledgeable about the jewelry and very helpful with advice on what to get my wife since I am a clueless guy. And I'm my price range.

name: Morning Jones
text: My fiancé proposed to me with a beautiful ring from this location Kay's. They told him that he earned $1300 dollars of rewards for his purchase that he could use towards our bands before they expire in a few months. When we returned to look at bands, the sales associate proceeded to tell us that it isn't a $1300 worth of rewards, it's 1300 rewards points. She also told us you have to spend an outrageous amount to even redeem any of your "$1300" reward points. That same day I had my ring and band sent off to be resized. The sales lady told me that they would be ready on the twentieth, which was nearly two weeks. I showed up today to pick up my rings, and a very rude pretentious older sales man informed me that neither of my rings were ready to pick up and that I would have to come back another time. I was pretty pissed to say the least. And I am still waiting for a call about picking up my rings. I would not recommend this store at all.

text: The sales associate are rude as hell!!!!! I've had nothing but bad experiences since I had my ring sent off for repair. I wouldn't  recommend anyone to buy from kays. #onepissedcustomer

text: Terrible! I came into this Kay to get a necklace repaired, and I was told that it had to be sent off for repair. I was told that my necklace would be back within a week's time, and I would receive a phone call when it was ready. It has been a whole MONTH, and I have yet to receive a call. I have been back on 2 separate occasions to inquire about the whereabouts of my jewelry, and those have both been frustrating experiences because no one had any answers for me. Avoid this location if possible!!

name: James Rogers

name: Michael Pratt
text: Awesome sauce

name: Jason
text: The Zales in Foley Alabama has employees that will mislead you. The told my wife a size 7 ring with wrap around stones could be sized to a 5. Then stated it would be a 3 to 4 week wait to get it sized, then recommended another jeweler to size it in 24 hours. We bought the ring ( over $1000) and went to the other jeweler who said there was no way he could sized it and they knew. When we took it back ( 1 hour later) they started acting like they could only refund $200, they did end up refunding the whole amount. This sale was a blatant lie from the beginning.  An attempt to make a sale at all costs and not refund your money. Full of lies.

name: Kathrine Steinbach
text:
I’ve always heard bad things about signet owned jewelry stores and big brand jewelry stores but I never experienced it first hand until I visited this store.

I received a lovely white sapphire ring as a gift which was purchased online. About a month after receiving the ring, it became apparent to me that the main stone was loose (it was not only wiggly and I could feel it, but it was actually rattling audibly). From being loose there was dust/dirt trapped between the stone and the basket of the stone. Keep in mind I had not been wearing it daily so it was surprising it came loose after such a short period of time.

I brought the ring to the foley Zales to have the sterling silver prongs tightened and the basket cleaned. The rep there said since it wasn’t purchased with warranty I had to pay out of pocket for both the cleaning and repair. It would cost $90.00. (Almost as much as the gift itself, but I couldn’t do anything about the fact it hadnt been purchased without a warranty and I wasn’t going to call up the person who gave it to because that would be rude).

When I picked up the ring I was ready to pay for services done, except the moment my hands touched it I knew it was still loose. I showed the representatives behind the counter and they swore up and down to me that it wasn’t loose and it was my imagination. They wiggled it and one even got her pen ink on it trying to “disprove” me.

They said they could send it back free of charge so I said ok. But I got a bad feeling and since it had become a sentimental gift I felt like I no longer trusted that store to handle it since I felt like they were lying to me about it not being loose. I asked them for it back and they said yes but they would have to charge me the $90.00. I didn’t want to have a confrontation with them so I paid and figured maybe I should just get a second opinion because it very well could be my imagination.

She swipes my card and is packing it up and I said “I hear it rattling, tell me you can’t hear that! Call me crazy, It can’t be my imagination!”

She held it up to her ear and to my surprise said “yes! I do hear it rattling. You’re not crazy”.

Im dumbfounded!! Before I paid, she said it wasn’t loose, lied to my face, then the moment I swiped my card, she acknowledged it was loose!!! I am appalled. I’m just going to dispute the transaction with my bank now because there is no way I trust the people working there. And I’m going to advise the person who purchased it for me to do the same. I won’t be making any purchases from jewelry stores like this again. I learned the hard way, at least this time it was only $90 instead of $900

name: Mandey Shiver
text: The engagement ring that I had now had for five years kept loosing diamonds every couple of months.  I was so frustrated with this happening. Luckily, every time I went into Kay’s to get it sent off I dealt with the same sweet girl, Elizabeth.  Elizabeth was always very understanding and apologetic.  After about the fourth time of loosing a diamond Elizabeth told me she would talk to her manager to see if they could get me a new ring or just pick out a completely different one.  I sent it off that time and believe it or not, four months later a diamond was missing again. I went back up to Kay’s and luckily Elizabeth was there and I didn’t even have to explain to her what happened, she remembered every detail we had talked about.  I ended up picking out a simple solitaire ring. I hated having to change the ring design but luckily because of Elizabeth’s AMAZING customer service and patience the process was a breeze! Every Kay store needs an Elizabeth in their store!

I was told that yes they CAN order links had I purchased the watch from them, but since I did not purchase the watch from them, I had to order them directly from the manufacturer. To be told they would not help me because the watch was not bought from them(which I did not purchase the watch, it was a gift for my dad) put a nail in the coffin. I have spent a lot of money in there over the years but they will never receive another penny of my money. SUPER POOR BUSINESS PRACTICES!!!!!!!

name: Amanda Carrier
text: The ladies that work are super sweet and incredibly helpful ❤

name: Cara Rigby
text:
HORRIBLE MANAGER NAMED MICHELLE!!!

Worst Customer service ive ever experienced anywhere! Went to Kays about a week & a half ago to look and purchase an engagement ring with my fiance. Starting looking at rings in our budget and was only shown 1 ring which I loved (& the girl who showed us the ring got kinda in trouble for showing it to us) until they said they were having a diamond show & started showing me rings from those cases, apparently they only have a diamond show every so often and I was shown about 3 rings or so from those cases & ended up picking one of the 3 after being felt like those were the only ones in our budget and  I was pressured into it. We were able to get the ring sized that day & take it home.

Skip to week or so later, I decided to just browse online at rings that were in our budget & that said available in store at my local store. Came across several beautiful rings that I was NEVER shown to begin with so I decided to call and speak with the manager who helped us & told her about how I had seen a few online that said they were available in store & in our budget, so I go to the store to see them in person to make sure I didn't pick the wrong ring.
Got there & the manager who from the first visit was super helpful and nice, didn't speak to me once when I entered the store. I showed the girl who was helping me a few rings I seen online that said they were in store & the first ring she said " oh we just sold that ring" the 2nd and 3rd ring I showed her she Said " I don't think we have it" & I was like "why would it say it was in store if It wasnt?" She couldn't give me an answer. She did everything in her power to convince me to keep the ring I had but that pissed me off even more so I still ended up returning the ring which I know they aren't happy about, but I wasn't happy with being pretty much only shown options that benefited them. They didn't treat me the same as the first experience & u just don't do your customers that way. Regardless. I will do everything to make sure everyone is aware of how crooked this place is.

Also, after returning the ring (which was leased throigh progressive) we made an account online to see how the process of the refund was going, come to find out our total was double the price we were told it would be in store from the kay employees. The deposit we put down was suppose to be 79 dollars and would also be the amount of our monthy payment & after looking online we discovered they charged us 86 dollars for the deposit & that our payments would be 91.60 WEEKLY! We were told 79 dollars and some change monthly and then it shot up to 91.60 weekly! They never went over the contract or interest rate with us.

After the return I asked the employee if everything on their end was done and all we were waiting on was the leasing company to do their part. Called the leasing company to find out that they were waiting on KAYS to send the invoice over to get the refund process done & taken care of.

Called Kays once again to speak with the unprofessional, rude heifer off a "Manager" to make sure they sent the invoice in and to try to get some answers as to why she never vocally disclosed with us while signing the lease that our total was actually double the price she told us, & she would not answer the question. All she would say was "you made the return, what else do you need, blah blah.." How they can get away with is beyond me, after asking her multiple times times she actually HUNG UP on us. I called bk & another girl asnwer the phone, I continued to try to get answers we as customers deserved & as I was speaking the girl started pressing buttons on the phone & then hung up on me, incredibly immature & unprofessional. I am mind blown at my experience. I made a complaint with corporate, with the better business Bureau and got intouch with the district manager with the help of another kays manager of a different location!
KAYS IS A FREAKING JOKE, THEY LIE & NEVER FULLY DISCLOSE THE FULL TRUTH & PRICE TO THEIR CUSTOMERS IN ORDER TO MAKE THEIR SALES & COMMISSION!

My intention was to purchase two necklaces as well but I didn’t because of the rudeness. I could have been confrontational but I chose to take the higher road and post this review instead. Please know that all the stores aren’t like this and I will continue to shop with Reed’s Jewelry, just not this particular store.

text: Careless, irresponsible, poor service. Brought my brand new watch for band adjustment (remove links) and ended up with lots of scratches. Do not recommend.

name: Dana Trammell
text: I got a new Effy ring for Christmas but it needed sizing. It was a 7 and several places wanted to send it off for 3 plus weeks and other places were astronomical in price. I found this place and they do their service in house. It usually takes a couple of days for sizing. I tried on the ring sizes and settled on a 5 but when I tried it on was disappointed and wanted it bigger. I told the guy it was just too tight and I would be glad to pay extra but just needed it right. He asked if a 5 and 1/4 would work and I thought it would. He got me to come back in a couple of hours and it was perfect! He didn’t charge me any extra at all. These guys are very professional, fast, efficient, and know everything about jewelry and their prices are the best in town! Believe me, I went to them all. This will be my go to place from now on. I highly recommend this place.

name: Daniel Flynn
text: Got a watch as a wedding gift a couple years back and have never worn it. Decided it was time, but I had to get links removed. Then found out the battery had stopped. Took it here and they replaced the battery and the links within 10 minutes(was told by another company that I would have to ship it off and it would take 3 weeks or so to get back). So 10 minutes, and 17 dollars later, my watch was fitting and working. Can't beat that.

text:
I've used these guys on more than one occasion. Once to replace the crystal and battery on my Fossil watch, and they were also able to polish the links to bring it back to life. Again to purchase two wedding bands, and to have the stone placed in the setting of an engagement ring. And another for the repair of two rings that involved reforming the ring to size and replacing a few stones.

All three times the two guys working the counter were nothing more than helpful. I saw where someone said that they were intimidating. I am 6'5" and the owner was a little bigger than me, so if they were insecure about themselves, then maybe but they were friendly on the phone and in person and talked to me no different than they might a friend. So if personable and joking customer service isn't your thing then maybe they're not for you. But the price was right and the work and service was great.

The entire staff is incredibly professional, extremely talented, very pleasant, and eager to serve. I won't say how much the repair cost me, but I will say that their amazing generosity not only surprised me, but completely humbled me (particularly given this strained economic time in which we're living). name: Kelly Mattos
text:
In mid-late October 2013 I took my watch to the Jewelry and Watch repair center on University. The owner changed my battery and then admitted to me that he had broken the watch crystal (clear glass over watch face). He reassured me that he would fix my watch. He is a liar, thief and con-artist. In the almost two months that they were “fixing” my watch I went 3 times to try to get any information. Finally I just gave up and told them to give me my watch broken. The owner was rude, impolite and intimidating.
Whenever; I informed him that I wanted my watch immediately regardless of the fact that 2 months later it was STILL BROKEN. He said that he had tried to “make it right” and that he had been looking to buy me another watch from EBAY. The watch I have is a limited edition Android Prism watch that is no longer being made. He said that he had been unable to find any watch similar to mine. While I do not watch a watch from EBAY; I would like to point out that in the last 4 minutes I have found over 5 watches currently for sale on EBAY with the exact same crystal. These are not cheap Wal-Mart watches; he simply did not even try to find a similar watch.
The owner stated that since he had been unable to find a similar watch on ebay (lie) that he would have to send the watch out to Las Vegas to have a crystal custom made. If that was the case then why after 2 months was my watch still sitting on the counter? Why had they not already sent it to be fixed?  It does not take 2 months to drive to the post office. It is apparent that they had no plans on trying to fix my watch.
When the watch was originally broken by the owner, it had a tiny chip in the upper right corner. The watch has received even more damage since it has been in their possession. The original chip has spread to 3 times the size along with a new crack on the upper left. The back is covered in DOZENS of scratches and the hands do not seem to be functioning correctly.
The owner did not even try to fix my watch. He did not even offer a replacement. Under no circumstances should anyone ever go to these people. Now all I have is a broken piece of crap, and no way to have it fixed or repaired. They broke my watch and refused to fix it. These people are terrible.

text: Buyers beware!!! My fiancé bought my engagement ring from here. I came to get it sized and it came back with a diamond missing and the size was wrong. The salesperson, Sam told me everything goes to corporate so I thought it was in good hands. They sent it off again and went it returned it was a whole other ring. My beautiful ring was completely scratched up and 4 of my once flawless colorless diamonds were now visibly yellow! Turned out that Sam lied to me because it had went to a local jeweler. The managers excuse were the diamonds must of gotten burnt. There were many other excuses but this one was most shocking. Diamonds don’t burn!! We told them we wanted the original diamonds put back in and have it appraised to see if it matched our original cert card and they refused. All trust was out the window and we had no choice but to return it. They have made the whole experience a complete nightmare and have now ruined my engagement. I’ve heard horror stories of this place swapping diamonds before and clearly they’re still doing it! Do not buy from these people they commit fraud with no conscience.

name: Jonathan Norman
text: Awful experience all around. They butchered and destroyed my fiancé’s ring when she sent it off to be sized, twice. The lack of taking responsibility along with the lies and excuses the staff made up were beyond baffling. I will never set foot in this place again.

name: Shane Williams
text: Sam was awesome and very professional and made me feel comfortable and didn't make me feel pressurized to buy. She took her time and helped me find the perfect ring!

name: Jessica Ellis
text: Shazi is wonderful!!!! She has made me want to continue to be a Zales customer. After dealing with the Trussville store 3 separate times and having no success in getting answers in getting a wedding band and a certification cardfor my engagement ring, she took 30 minutes out of her time to take care of us. She got with her manger about getting our cert card and then explained in detail why my engagement ring that was purchased in May was no longer being made as well as the band to accompany it. She then worked diligently to find a band that complimented my ring. If not for her we would’ve taken our bus was to Kay’s or Jared’s and been done but she took time out of her day to handle a simple customer service issue and made us her personal customers for life.

name: Bethany
text: Very poor experience. Clearly commission based, where no one wants to be inconvenienced to clean/inspect your ring to keep up the warranty as instructed; only to wait on those to make a sale. Waited a very long time for my turn and was treated incredibly rudely. Do not plan to ever purchase anything from them again.

name: Kayla Lorence
text: Horrible customer service from both Indian ladies. The older Indian lady had a straight up attitude. They treat customers different depending on if they are coming in to buy something new vs. getting something cleaned or replaced. I don’t know if it’s a commission thing or it’s just who they are. ( where they realize they won’t be getting any commission off of you, therefore service is bad). I honestly don’t know.

name: Stephanie Donnell
text: I went to exchange my ring, and the sales representative Shazi was amazing. She was very helpful! She took her time showing us rings and very patient.

name: Jalesa Mitchell
text: Sam was amazing , go check her out ! She did everything she could to get me the ring of my dreams !!!!

name: Naia “Shiro” Ōkami
text: Went to look at engagement rings with my fiance and her sister. Was not acknowledged by any staff. Tried multiple times to at least get my presence acknowledged and was treated terribly. Lost a customer that was ready to buy!

name: Fred Beeson
text: Shazi is the best ! She helped me pick out the perfect diamond. No pushy sales tactics with her. Very helpful and professional.

name: S Taylor
text: I bought a ring here, and brought it in soon after because I noticed scratches on it and needed them to clean it. When I went to go get my ring, the employee I dealt with had a poor attitude. I asked her if anything was wrong, and she didn't say anything. I won't be going back here again.

name: main man
text: Ask for Shazi or Sam both are friendly and helpful..knowledgeable about all things diamonds.

name: Jordyn Gilley
text: Do not waste your hard earned money here. My ring has broken twice in 2 months, not to mention the first time it took them 3 weeks to return it. The second time 4 weeks. And even then they won't call you to tell you it's ready. You literally have to call every day and pester them to see if it's back from repair.

name: Judy Pruett
text: If you are wanting the best Jewelry Consultant, ask for Shazi! She is extremely knowledgeable and personable  She takes her time to find out what you are looking for.

name: Brittany Lamb
text: Buyer beware!! I searched for months to find a ring that I wanted for Christmas. My husband I went to the Galleria location to get my size and we wanted to look at the one I had found. Unfortunately it was an “online only” item. The woman who got my size acted as if she was not only inconvenienced by us but as if she was better than us. So my husband ended up ordering the ring and gave it to me on Christmas Eve. When I took it out of the box and put it on I noticed one of the diamonds were missing. My husband immediately called their 1-800 customer service number and they directed us to take the ring to the nearest Zales and they would decide wether to have the ring repaired or replaced. Being Christmas Eve night the location was closed and closed the next day for Christmas. We went to the Galleria location on December 26th and when we explained the situation to an employee they went and got the manager. The manager then asked what we wanted done. I told them I wanted it fixed. Then they asked if I had the paper work for the diamond bond that came with it. I told them no that it should be fixed period considering it was a brand new ring. After about 30 minutes of talking to the manager she said she would take care of it and we wouldn’t have to use the diamond bond and we wouldn’t have to pay for anything. I even went ahead and bought the extended warranty on the metal and the sapphire. The manager said it should be ready by January 7th. When that day got here my husband called and it was not ready yet. Well my husband got a call yesterday, January 10th, that the ring was ready and that it was going to cost $110. When we got there to pick up the ring the woman that was working was the rude woman that waited on us before and the one that rang up my extended warranty. She told us it was going to be the $110. I told her we weren’t paying a dime that the manager was supposed to be taking care of it. Apparently the manager was not there and had made no notes of anything!! I got extremely frustrated and upset. Eventually, after getting verbal and irrate, another employee came over and tried to calm me down. The woman ended up giving us the ring and not charging us. None of this should have ever happened. I will never buy another thing from Zales again!!

name: Stephen Glass
text: Terrible staff they are rude. Be careful they will charge you more and not tell you that they added stuff to your receipt.

name: Juarron Jackson
text: Ms sam andMrs Shazi are very professional and friendly I had a great experience .And I will like to come back next time with my friends

name: HayRed
text: The sales lady seemed bordeline psychotic. My boyfriend and I wanted to look at engagement rings that I had seen online just to see what they looked like in person. We told the sales lady multiple times we were NOT buying a ring, yet she kept pestering. "Why are you not buying a ring today? Why can't you? You can just give me your credit card you don't have to give me any money today." Then she says to my boyfriend, "Is it because she's here with you?" And then she proceeds to look at me and say, "Can I speak with him alone please?" Needless to say I said NO and we left. Crazy!!! Don't go to this jewelry store. My boyfriend and I both left angry.

name: Da Mo
text: Do not buy from zales, at least not this store. Made the mistake of buying from there. The lady was super pushy and she literally was forcing me to buy. Don't waste your time and money.

name: E
text: Saleslady was super pushy and would not listen to neither me nor my wife. Also do not let her check your credit, never signed anything and they opened a line of credit anyway. Then I call and she was rude and did not want to listen again. Best advice is to go to DD or somewhere else, completely unprofessional.

name: Stephanie Earley
text: Sam, the saleslady, was ULTRA pushy. I know it's a commission job, but seriously, she    tried to force a sale on me. Definitely better jewelry stores in the Galleria. Try Helzberg or Kay.

name: Bridgette McBride
text: I went there in September and I was really impressed with Shazi. She was very helpful and friendly. I really couldn't decide what I wanted. Shazi gave me her card and asked me to come back. Well I must say I traveled 4 hours to get there. I came back on the 9th of December and I stopped by. Shazi had a customer but she noticed that I was waiting for her. Very good customer service. After she got through she helped me and I promised I love my rings. Again,I really couldn't decide what I wanted but she helped me all the way. Once I finished she thanked me and actually came from behind the counter and gave me a hug. I promise you can't find customer service like that all the time. Shazi u keep up the good work and I assure you that it will take u far in life. Thanks again Shazi☆☆☆☆☆

name: B Little
text: wouldn't shop here,they are not serious enough with buyers,and try to push different merchandise other than what you want.I wanted white gold,they pushed yellow gold,but a selection of white gold mens necklaces available.Figgaros,cubans,so forth and so on....

name: Kenyun Moore
text: I incourage you to go spend money some and to visit with Sales associate (Sam)

name: Aki Shin
text: Very bad experience. The customer services look very evil, when I got into the store, they looked at me unfriendly. And when I left, they talked and laughed, very rude.

name: Mrs Patrick
text: No words, do not buy from zales

name: Sam Keske
text: Got my wife's engagement ring here while we were both in grad school at Auburn, and still enjoy visiting with everybody when we visit. The signature jeweler in Auburn, and family owned for many years - you may even catch Ronnie Ware on a good day. Great for Tacori, Rolex, John Hardy, etc., down to Christmas ornaments and glassware.

name: Cindy S
text: The staff at all of the Ware Jewelers locations make customer service their first priority. They take the time to get to know each customer personally which always has them coming back. They carry all of the great designers such as Rolex, David Yurman, John Hardy, Tag Heuer and more! I am blown away by how knowledgeable their staff is about diamonds, gemstones, and precious metals because they mostly all have extensive training and jewelry related degrees. I highly recommend any of their stores!

name: Anwar LNU
text:
Met Lisa on my most recent visit to Auburn.  I am in the market for a Rolex and she was the consumate professional, extremely knowledgeable, charming and polite.  She educated me regarding the demand for these timepieces and wished me well even though she didn't have what I wanted at the time.
Would definitely suggest a visit to Ware Jewelers if you are in the market for a Rolex and definitely ask for Lisa!

name: Scott Holley
text: I have been doing business with Ronnie and Tina for 20 years. They have great merchandise and service. They are always so helpful. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tammy Benda
text: I love working with family businesses that treat you right and value your business.  Ware is one of the best!  The jewelry is what brought me in.  The people make it the only place I will shop for jewelry again.

name: Laura Stephens
text: Literally the worst store on the planet. They lost my grandmothers pearl necklace clasp in the restringing of the pearls. It was the only piece of jewelry she ever gave me upon my high school graduation. They were brought back from the war by my grandfather and given to my grandmother. The clasp is what dated the pearls and proved their history.  They also cut my best friends diamond setting to force in a diamond that didn’t fit into the ring, and shortly after, the diamond fell out... the list goes on and on. Plus their prices are ridiculous. Go to Solomon brothers in Atlanta before you trust these people with anything!!!!!!!! We are totally heartbroken over the pearls and wouldn’t want anyone else to ever experience that!

name: Austin Till
text: McKee is absolutely wonderful and the biggest help I could have ever asked for. I go to her for all my gift needs. You won't be disappointed with her friendly, Grade A service.  If you're looking for someone helpful, look no further. I will continue to be a Ware customer as long as McKee is employed there.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I live in Montgomery but while I was in Auburn I went by Ware's to see if they could adjust the band on a Cartier watch I was wearing. Ware's doesn't sell Cartier, but I know they sell and repair Rolexes so I felt confident in their ability to work on my Cartier. They did a quick and excellent job, of course. One of these days I'm going to get one of their Auburn watches!

resp.text: Thank you, Carol!  It's always a pleasure to be of service.

name: Parker Johnston
text: I had a very good experience at Ware today.  Worth the trip over from Columbus.  Justin fixed my watch while I waited and it looks great.  Thanks and great job!

resp.text: Thank you, Parker!  We're glad to know it was worth the trip.  We appreciate you going out of your way to entrust your watch to us!

name: Ben McCoy
text: I have bought all my wife's jewlery here even living in another state I always come back!  Jo is the best at keeping me out of the dog house!  They have the best prices and make sure everything is perfect!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben!  Jo does have a talent for helping pick out just the right gift to help soothe the raging seas.

name: Michele Kostelecky
text: We loved our experience at Ware Jewelers!  Thank you so much for being so kind and helpful to us.  Lisa Stevens was great and making us feel at ease and comfortable in our purchases and decisions.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Michelle!  Lisa's a real gem, and we're glad you had such a wonderful experience working with her.

name: Lexie McCormick (Lexie)
text: Ware Jewelers is the only jewelry store I will shop at. Everyone is so nice and you get help as soon as you walk in the doors! They have the prettiest jewelry I have ever seen.

resp.text: Thank you, Alexis!  We always want to make everyone feel right at home when they come through our doors!

name: Paul Berngard
text: Amazing experience.  Lisa is excellent and gives the best customer service.   Have purchased numerous timepieces from her and will only go through her for future buys.   If you are looking to get a Rolex or any other piece of fine jewelery do not hesitate to go see Lisa.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Paul!  We agree completely that Lisa's service and knowledge are top-of-the-line, and we count ourselves lucky to have her.

name: J Sims
text: Went in with my Girlfriend this evening looking for engagement rings for her. Was served by Jennifer, her service was superb. And the selection was just as fantastic. Will definitely be purchasing my rings from Wares.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  I know Jennifer will be thrilled to help you find the perfect ring when the time comes!

name: Kimberly Burns
text: Friendly & helpful customer service. Beautiful jewelry. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years!! Love Ware Jewelers!!  😀

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kimberly!  It means the world to us that you've trusted us for so long!

name: Ann Canon
text: Wares has been, in my opinion, the top jewelry store in the southeast. When I need to shop for jewelry or for gifts I always shop there first. My mother never shopped anywhere else for wedding gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ann!  It really means the world to us to hear from our long-standing clients.  You and your mother really exemplify the kind of local connections that have kept us in business for 70 years now.

name: Luis Dopico
text: Ware Jewelers is absolutely the best jewelers. I have tried several other jewelers since moving away from Auburn and I have never had the same level of service and quality. Now, I will only go to Wares for new items or repair or redesign of older items. I have learned my lesson. It doesn't pay to go anywhere else. Also, I wanted a custom piece made and the jewelers at Ware's exceeded anything I could have ever imagined. They don't just create jewelry, they create memories. Thanks to Lisa Stevens who is absolutely amazing to work with and will do whatever it takes to make sure you find exactly the special piece you are looking for!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Luis!  It means the world to us that you've been so satisfied with our services for so long.  We'll do our best to keep exceeding expectations and hope to keep you happy for many years to come!  And lest I forget, yes, Lisa really does go above and beyond to make sure her clients get taken care of.  We're glad you've gotten to experience that first hand!

name: Chennan Xue
text: Very helpful and friendly staffs. Helped me adjust my watch strap (actually twice) and didn't charge me. Thank you!

resp.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, it is very much appreciated! We are always just a phone call or email away ! Wish you the best!
Kind Regards,
Ronnie Ware

name: Melissa Warnke
text: Tina and Ronnie helped us find exactly what we wanted, and their customer service is unmatched! Thank you for making our experience so great!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Melissa!  It was a pleasure having you in, and we loved helping you!

name: Judith Jones
text: Always helpful. Always kind!  Great inventory!!!  I use their lawaway service every year and start my Christmas shopping early!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Judith!  The layaway plan really is a great option for keeping on top of your gift-giving plans!

name: Kayla Sprayberry
text: I dropped my engagement ring off on Saturday to get resized and got it back Monday evening it looks amazing. Great price would definitely recommend ware jewelers to anyone.

name: Darlene Smith

resp.text: Thank you, Darlene!  We're always happy to help.

name: T. P.
text: Ben was so very helpful, I never felt rushed and he was extremely knowledgeable and professional. I would highly recommend Ware Jewelers for your next purchase.

resp.text: Thank you, Tonja!  We've counted ourselves very lucky to have Ben as part of the Ware family, his concern for his clients really is second to none.

I was promised they'd bring in more stones for me to look at, and even after i emailed the person who "helped" me, i go no answer. Not a very smart way to do things. I'll never be buying anything from them for the rest of my life. And will strongly advice against it.

name: Ariel Whitney
text: The workers at the Charlotte Russe (CR), Tuscaloosa, AL, University Mall location have very bad attitudes and give very poor service. They lie to customers by telling them that the store closes at 5:30 p.m. on Sunday's, which is clearly not true if the gates aren't even shut; and the hours online clearly reflect that they are not supposed to be closing until 6 p.m. They also have this lady named Shelia who attempts to intimidate customers by standing at the entrance like a security guard with a stick shooing them away and telling us as customers that we can not enter the store. If they are that miserable working at CR, FIND ANOTHER CAREER. A customer service job is obviously NOT for you. Shelia, is one disgusting human being that needs prayer. I really hope corporate steps in because those workers are tarnishing the reputation of Charlotte Russe. I love CR, but I would advise any and everyone I know and don't know not to shop at that particular location. They are simply rude.

name: Nicole T. Springer
text: I was blown away by the customer service at Hudson-Poole. We came in to look at engagement rings on a Saturday about 30 minutes from closing, and the staff were incredible. I told them what I liked and my budget and they were able to help us find ones that fit what we wanted. The store is immaculate, and you can tell they truly want each customer to have a great and personalized experience. They were never pushy or looking to push us past our price point at all. Incredibly patient and just a fantastic experience all around. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: WOW!!! Thank you so much, Nicole. It means so much to us that you took the time to share this. Please come back by to see us whenever you are close. We wish you both many blessings! Sincerely, John Poole

name: Andy Love
text:
The reviews here don’t lie.. excellent customer services! My name is Holly . I have visited the store to redesign a band for my diamond ring that I’ve had for a long time but not liking the style too much.
They drawer up a beautiful fancy computer graphics design of the ring base on details I want with measurements of all angle... and even provided me a wax version of the band to try on.. and everything is free of charge.. isn’t that Amazing 💕
But I later have decided of not to go with it because my sister like the original ring and wanted to purchase the ring from me..
I felt bad to have them working so hard for me for nothing so I also purchased a beautiful pair of diamonds and citrine earring before I left the store just to thank you for their service ❤️
Love them ❤️The best in town

resp.text: Holly, you are so sweet to take the time to write this incredible review!!! We love making custom pieces with family stones. That is what makes jewelry so special, the ones that can tell the story of the family and their journey. I am so glad that your sister will be enjoying that ring. Please let us know if we can help in the future. We wish you many blessings!!

name: William Curry
text: John and his staff are exceptional. The customer service at Hudson and Poole is great. When you walk in they greet you with a smile. Ten years ago, I purchased my wife’s engagement ring here because of their wonderful reputation. With help from Krista, I got the perfect ring (All of the 4Cs) for my wife. Thanks a million.

name: Benjamin Brown
text: Very helpful and friendly staff, but the appraiser is incompetent. Don't waste your money getting your jewelry appraised here.

name: Honor Able
text: I went there a year ago to get my sons name engraved on his necklace. They were very welcoming from the moment you walk in to the moment you walk out

text: Very elegant store and friendly stafr

text: Awesome jewelry and great service and the best book/do it all keeper ever 👍

resp.text: Holly, thank you so much for your kind words about our wonderful staff. We sincerely appreciate you for the time you took to give us this review!

name: Jeffrey (Jeff) Muratori
text: Great service with a friendly environment! Will definitely be going back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Jeffrey!

name: Ashley “Kav” Kavanagh
text: Incredibly helpful staff! They appraised and cleaned my antique and new jewelry and were very intrigued by a few pieces discussing with me all the details they could tell me. Definitely will be returning for future cleanings and hopefully purchases as well!

resp.text: Ashley, we thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great review and for the five stars! Come by anytime and have a great day.

name: James Waltman
text: Wonderful collection of jewelry and other great gift ideas. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers is the ONLY place i shop for my fine jewelry needs.

name: Junea Childers
text: Traveled 108 miles getting there. Called before I went. Told them I was bringing a 1954 Gibson Mandolin. However when I got there. I was being checked in by a nice counter clerk, when all of the sudden a young man came out and abruptly rushed me out saying "there was no market for instruments". When in their TV ad they had promoted a variety of items they were accepting. Instruments included.

resp.text:
Junea,
I am so sorry that you took your time to come to our store and not get a good answer. This is the first time we have partnered with a buying group that does the variety that they do. I wish the young man had asked me or my father who in town deals in fine instruments. I have a wonderful referral for you, as we have already called one of the owners that would very much like to make an offer on your mandolin. Please contact Dan at the Guitar Gallery. Here is their website:
https://theguitargallery.com

We really hope that this works out, and we will  always be here to help in any of your jewelry needs if you can give us another chance.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice-President

name: Luke Remmert
text: Simply the best jeweler in town. No need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: We really appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review, Luke!

name: Andrew Durham
text: I’m not sure where to start to explain how happy and satisifed I am with Hudson Poole. I walked in and met Heather, and from the second I met her I felt so comfortable and like I knew her. Mrs. Jamie Poole shortly also assisted me. Mrs. Poole was absolutely wonderful. She respected my opinions, she walked me through a step in life that I am new to. Hudson Poole has my business for life. Generally, going into a fine jewelry store is a very overwhelming experience as generally the staff doesn’t open up and welcome. These folks made me feel like family. Thank you Hudson Poole for being so amazing!

resp.text: Jake, thank you so much for this incredible review!! We are extremely proud and humbled that you have chosen us to be your family jeweler, and we work very hard to keep your trust.

name: Happy Lady
text: First I would like to say thank John for doing a fantastic job with my ring. John went above and beyond to work with me. Everyone at Hudson Poole always makes me feel welcome. I will use Hudson Poole forever. The way I can custom do jewelry makes me so excited!

resp.text: WOW! This is an amazing review! Thank you so much!!

name: caroline staggers
text: Always very friendly, professional and helpful. Beautiful selection of jewelry and gifts. Do great repair work.

resp.text: Caroline, Thank you very much for this great review. We really appreciate you coming by to see us!

name: Peony
text: I spent a long time searching for a strong but delicate-looking die-struck (not cast) setting for the stones from my old broken down three-stone ring. Krista and staff helped me find the perfect setting. I drove hours to Tuscaloosa and back several times (past plenty of other jewelry stores) to get the prettiest ring and best customer service. Everyone at Hudson-Poole is responsive and so helpful--in person, by phone, text and email. The long trip was absolutely worth it!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for giving us this wonderful review! We appreciate you trusting us to reset your three stone ring. Please come by anytime for us to clean and check it.

name: Jeremey Newell
text: I had a very special wedding band sized down. I took it home and noticed it didn’t fit as well as I thought. This was a mistake that I personally made. It had nothing to do with the quality of work that Hudson-Poole provides. I went back to Hudson-Poole and asked them to resize again. Not only did they resize, but they did it at no additional costs. They said my satisfaction was their goal. Excellent customer care. They will definitely handle all of my fine jewelry business in the future.

name: Emily DeFrance
text: Their jewelry is exquisite and there are so many beautiful choices. The customer service is excellent and you feel like family when you are there.

resp.text: Emily, thank you for coming to see us and for the excellent review. We will work hard to make sure it stays this way and for anyone you send to us. I am so sorry for the late "thank you". Have a wonderful 4th of July!

name: Vivian Tant
text: Gene and his staff are phenomenal. You immediately feel at home when you walk through the door. Gene and John both did a fantastic job of helping me pick out my wedding band and my future husbands wedding band. They talked me through the whole process, and I left feeling like I knew exactly what I was getting and how important I was to their company. I will forever send anyone looking for jewelry to them! Thankful for such a wonderful company in our community!

resp.text: Vivian, thank you so much for this phenomenal review! We appreciate you letting us be the ones to help you with your wedding bands and we will continue to work hard to keep that trust to be your family jeweler.

name: George Jacob Houghtaling
text: The BEST jewelry store in Alabama!  The BEST customer service in Alabama!  The BEST prices in Alabama!  You get the idea?  I have been doing business here over 12 years and never have been disappointed.  Gene, Jamie, John, Krista and their outstanding staff are true professionals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review, George!!

name: Leanne Phillips Mays
text: I just purchased my garnet and diamond "Roll Tide" ring from out of state. I originally saw this ring on Pinterest several years ago, and have spent many nights stressing that they would discontinue it before I could buy it. Ashley took care of me with the most professional and caring manner. My ring arrived today, and it is worth every penny. Thank you for helping my dream piece of jewelry become a reality.

name: Susie Palmer
text:
Always very friendly staff.  Always.
I brought a box-chain necklace back, which I had bought from there.  It broke as I was cleaning it.
They repaired it on my visit and I walked out with it.
Not too mention, they also helped me a with watch band adjustment (not bought from them). Noncharge.  Simply a complimentary service.
That's why I will wait, until a trip back to Alabama from Oklahoma, just to go by Hidson-Poole.  They always treat me well.
Thank you!  :)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susie. I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to give us this great review. We hope to see you the next time you are back in Tuscaloosa.

name: Kathleen Stein
text: They did a great job fixing my bracelet. Their price for the repair was very affordable and the customer service was great!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you very much, Kathleen!

name: Christien Hawthorne
text: I am absolutely in LOVE with my ring! I ordered it online and the next day received a call from John Poole who is the Vice President of the company. He told me that unfortunately the ring was out of stock but that he had already contacted the designer in New York to have them build a new one which would only take about two weeks. Sure enough, I later received another call from Mr. Poole notifying me that my ring was ready and that he would set up email alerts for the shipping so I could track the package. It arrived in a cute little wrapped box with a big bow and had a business card that was personally signed. Loved the personal touch. Awesome experience -- will definitely recommend to others!

name: HRH METALS
text: Very nice people/helpful/nice large place/probably have what you need or want

name: Barbara Nicosia
text: I left 2 pairs of earrings to be fixed.  When they called & gave me the price, I said just fix one, the other one’s too expensive for its worth.  When I picked them up, Mr. Poole told me they had fixed both of them, & he wasn’t going to charge me for the 2nd pair since it was their mistake.  So nice to find honest, reputable merchants still around!

resp.text: We really appreciate the five star rating and for this wonderful review, Barbara! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Sammy Gray
text: Exceptional service! Very courteous, and everyone went out of their way to help with all our needs. As a first time customer, I've definately found my new primary jeweler for future purchases!

name: Brittany Graham
text:
Hudson-Poole is a fantastic Place to purchase jewelry. Not only do they have an outstanding selection of merchandise that is all very different and can suit anyone’s taste, their customer service is out of this world. I will continue to shop from them, even though I am not a local, because of those two things.

They care about their customers, they have a fantastic selection, and you can tell that they care about you as a person and not just getting business from you. That, to me,  is everything. You can’t go wrong with this place! :-)

text: Big thanks to John for taking such great care of all my needs and wants. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for your next piece of jewelry! Thanks again for being so kind and taking care of me.

When my ring I had bought a month ago began to lose color, Hudson-Poole replaced it without any charge. I cannot speak highly enough on how wonderful this place is!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Hannah! We thank you for coming back to see us to let us get it right.

I have purchased and had custom pieces made by Hudson-Poole for many years.  In fact, I am working with John Poole now on a new custom ring.  If you are looking for a professional jeweler, visit Hudson-Poole in Tuscaloosa,Alabama.

Camille Ogden Robinson

name: Natalia Go
text: If I could give a 10 star out of 5, I would! Hudson-Poole saved my wedding day! This is probably the best jewelry store I every walked into. My fiancee and I don't have a big budget for our wedding and we needed something that we could afford. Ashley was there with us every step of the way, making sure that we get the rings we want and that we stay on budget. She is a hero! Plus, they offer services for maintenance and repairs, some for free. I definitely love Hudson-Poole <3 This will be the first place I would go to for any piece of jewelry.

resp.text:
Natalia,
I read your review and was blown away! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great testimonial. I spoke with Ashley and Tanner and we all truly appreciate you both thinking of us for your wedding rings.  We will do all we can to continue to be your family jeweler. The next time you are by the store I would really like to thank you in person, so please ask for me when you do. I wish you many blessings and Godspeed in all of your hopes and dreams together.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice President
