name: Christina Wilson
text: My friend and I literally sat, watched and actually heard them talking bad about me after I purchased a $3,000 ring. I bought my ring last Tuesday. They hurried it's sizing for me so it would be ready. That's ONE star. They told me it would be ready at 2pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 3pm. Wasn't. Then I was told 4pm. Wasn't. Then, at 5pm, I was told she left to pick up my ring, would be back in 15 minutes and I could go ahead and head up there. 30 minutes later I'm there. My ring isn't. An hour and 15 minutes later and she's not back with my ring. An hour and a half later, she's there with my ring. Isn't nice. Isn't happy. Isn't smiling. This is the MANAGER. She hands me my rings, doesn't ask if they fit ok, doesn't ask if I like them, doesn't ask if that would complete my purchase or if I need anything. Throws it in a box, hands it to me without saying a word and walks away! They talked bad about me because I'm already under the pressure of my wedding, getting my rings on time and I'm mad because they've told me lies all day long! Of course I'm going to be upset! I was lied to several times! What sucks for them?? I was preparing to buy a bracelet and a pair of earrings but instead, I walked out. When we got home we closed our credit account with them. TWO stars because my rings are absolutely beautiful. But, I will never go there again! She was sooo nice when she was selling me the rings but after she got her commission, she no longer cared if she upset me or not. She's the manager, yet her and her two employees sat there and talked about me while all three staring at me! So, two stars. For my beautiful rings and them helping me get my rings on time. What really sucks is I already left her a great review from when she wanted my money and sold me the rings. I'd love to speak to someone higher up, but they all seem to believe their employees, even if there are cameras. BTW, when I left, I went to Kay's and bought my earrings and bracelets from them! I was treated wonderfully there and would definitely recommend them! Not Zales.

name: Isaac Redding
text: Came to the store and found the ring my fiance wanted, ordered it and when it came in it was a 7 instead of a 6. They told me they could resize it but I wanted to pop the question, so, I told them I'd bring it back after the proposal. I ask her and she said yes but noticed, the chocolate diamonds that were supposed to be there were regular white diamonds. So, we dropped it off and now it's been two months and they won't give us the ring back and won't refund the ring. Beware of this place, read the other reviews they are scam artists that are trying to find behind a corporate name.

name: Charity Walker
text: I'm so disappointed and aggravated. Sent in my engagement ring to be sized BEFORE THANKSGIVING. I called multiple times after 3 weeks because they said that's about how long it would take. I called the Monday before  Christmas and they said it was shipping still.. Since then I've called daily with no one answering my calls. Someone finally answered today and said it was still shipping but then called my fiance back and said it is here.. when i arrived at the store and tried it on its STILL too loose. Oh and the lady said its been done since 12/10. No one bothered to call us. Horrible experience and ill have to get it resized again, but I'm going to go somewhere else for that now.

name: zoey bryant
text: My boyfriend got me an engagement ring and planned a trip to propose to me. He let them know his plans and what date we were going out of town. The sales team promised and assured him it would be back in time for his planned trip. It was not

name: Madeline Hawkins-Standley
text: This is a review on Signet Jewelers, the company that owns Zales, Kay, and Jarred. This Zales location is where my husband, the man in uniform in the picture below, bought my wedding ring (#19868058) on October 2017. When first purchased from Zales, the ring had a morganite stone, which was beautiful, but I had my heart set on aquamarine. We also purchased the lifetime warranty on the ring, and later another warranty just on the aquamarine stone I picked out. To make a long story short (for character count) during our time at Zales we were lied to, given false information, struggled getting in touch with the store as well as returned calls, and were pressured to purchase an aquamarine stone at a price much higher than previously discussed. Overall, my husband and I were very displeased with the service we received at Zales. Anyway, after a painstaking process, I finally got my ring back around December-January with the new aquamarine stone. Being fed up with Zales, my husband and I decided to go to Kay to have our wedding bands made. We went the same day I got my ring back from Zales to begin the process of ordering our wedding bands through Kay. His wedding band was relatively simple and took only about a month or 2 until we were able to pick it up, however, mine had to be custom made to fit the oval of my wedding ring. I picked the french beaded design Kay had for my wedding band to be made and they put all the information into the computer system. Kay assured us the bands would be ready in time for our wedding and that they would give us a call when I was able to pick my engagement ring up and to review and approve a molding of my wedding band. About 2 months went by and we hadn't heard anything, but I needed my ring for our engagement party. I had it for about a week and was told Kay needed it back to make the wedding band. Finally at about April or May we received the call that I was able to pick up my engagement ring, but never had a molding to look at and approve. In late May, about 2 weeks before we were getting married, Kay called and said my wedding band was ready. Upon seeing my wedding band that we had waited 4-5 months for the first time, I burst out crying uncontrollably and couldn't even speak to the lady. They had made the band in the wrong design. I was told that I either had to use that band to be married with and then we could start the process all over again after our honeymoon or that I wouldn't have anything to be married with. After several discussions with corporate, we were able to get our money back in full for my wedding band. I felt so defeated... I only had my engagement ring about 2 months out of our 9 month engagement period and I had no wedding band to be married with. Luckily, we found a local, family owned store that was able to make my wedding band in 2 weeks. Lou's in fact overdid themselves and made my wedding band OVERNIGHT! I saw the molding one day and was able to pick up my wedding set the next day! They saved us. But back to my aquamarine wedding ring. On the 5th day of our cruise I lost my stone. As you can see in the pictures below, the prong completely broke off and the stone fell out. I searched the ship for 4 hours, sobbing the entire time and finally a little girl found the stone at the bottom of the pool! We took the ring back to Zales as soon as we got back to port and they soldered a new prong on in about 2 weeks or so. Not even a month later when we were in Savannah for my birthday, I was taking my wedding set off to clean it and the band completely snapped in half (picture bellow). I took my ring to a local Zales a few days later, but not until another area on the band broke, leaving my ring in 2 pieces. Since we had the complete warranty on the ring and stone and this was the second time the ring had broken I told Zales that I wanted my aquamarine stone put into a new setting. Well now I have my ring back. No new setting, just soldered in 3 separate places. Now I'm scared just to put the ring on my finger. Why are we treated like this when we've paid so much money?

name: Nemindra Mahathalagalage
text: I went to the Zales store in Mobile AL to buy piece of jewelry and I was there for 5 minutes nobody came to greet me.  One lady was having a personal discussion with another person and laughing.  She saw me but didn't even want to say hi.  Just want to let you know went the Kay jewelers and spent 3K.  Service is horrible!  Not recommending your store to anyone.

name: Tyler Etheridge
text: I would give zero if I could. I made a purchase through Zales which was shipped by UPS. The order was lost by UPS and Zales refuses to refund my money or resend the order until UPS investigates which takes 30 days. This was a Christmas gift that won't make it before the holiday!

name: E Bee
text: great people  working who love there job

name: GeKayla Williams
text: My boyfriend and I will NEVER purchase anything else from Zales. Their team is horrible and I mean horrible when it comes to communicating with each other. A necklace that was purchased for me for Christmas was brought back to the store to get repaired in April they gave us a promise date of the next week. Since then we’ve called them four different time and has received four different dates and everyone I talk to seems to have no knowledge of what’s going on and when my necklace will be repaired and sent back to the store.

name: Jamie O'Bryant
text: Paid for a nice wedding band there. The display one was broken,  so they had to order another one.  They told us to take the broken display ring,  and "exchange" it when the new one came in.  I was not willing to be responsible for a ring that was already broken that I was not planning to keep. They finally agreed that we could pay and then pick up the ring when it came in 5 days.   Over a month later,  and several calls,  they couldn't figure out where the ring was, maybe they never ordered it.   They told us on Thursday that they'd order it and they'd call us Monday.  By Wednesday we called several times,  no answer EVER at the store during business hours.  Finally got an answer,  and they hung up on me.  We drove to the store,  waited in a huge crowd while only 3 employees tried to handle at least 20 customers (days before Christmas).  The only good thing about the experience was the person we purchased from was nice and spent time with us, and the person we requested our refund from was very understanding.  When we got there,  they did have the ring,  but we just got a refund because we don't want to deal with this location ever again.  There's plenty of other jewelers in Mobile,  even if we end up spending more money. We don't want to deal with a lifetime of repairs,  cleanings, resizings, etc through this location.  They have a nice selection and good deals,  but I'd only buy for something that is a one time thing,  like a necklace,  not something that you'll need to deal with them regularly.

name: Ashley McPherson
text: Rude and unprofessional sent my ring off to get a diamond replaced took almost a month. Then they never called and let me know my ring was back.  And it had been back for almost a week .I wouldn't give a damn if all the diamonds fell out im not sending it back!!!

text: Best place to buy jewelry!

name: Georgia Monroe
text: Professional employees, best selection of jewelry in this area, lowest prices. They greet you with a smile and are so friendly. If you are looking for a piece of jewelry, try them first. You will not be disappointed!

name: Tabitha Smith
text: All smiles and friendliness in this store! Jeff, Josh, and Melonie have been working there for many years. They are the kindest people. If you are looking for jewelry, this is the place to shop. Super low prices and great quality jewelry!

name: Matthew T
text: Good variety of men/women jewelry such as watches, rings, necklaces.  Most of the core brands were represented such as Citizen, Movado, Bolivia.

name: Fye ZeZe
text: Grace was really helpful and mindful of what we wanted and our choice couldn't be more perfect without her, my wife is very happy! Thank you!

name: Mattie Gray
text: Excellent customer service! Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a diamond without the hassle....or guilt.  They had the perfect ring to suit my (not very big) budget and got it to me just in time for the big moment.

name: Beverly Ritchey
text: Had the jewelry inspected an cleaned! Well worth the time and effort when it looks so good when they're done! Awesome job!

name: Ronnie Denney
text: Nice, the Beautiful woman was very helpful in finding the rite ring for my wife. She was not a pushy lady as trying for me to buy something I didn't like.  Great place to get your jewerl.

name: brannon ogle
text: Uneducated and lousy customer service. Would highly recommend Diamond Depot.

name: Heaven Black
text: The prices weren't bad. Quality is amazing. Customer service is lacking.

name: President Oatmeal
text: Great store. Great gifts for a smaller jewelry store. Awesome employees, very nice and patient.

name: Jenniffer Whyte
text: The customer service was not good. They called us to pick up our watch today (5/5/19), after we dropped it off in December. They charged us $214.50, and all they did was basic battery test gasket.

name: Kelly Glass
text: I would give a 0 if I could

name: Joey Brown
text: Absolute amazing shopping experience! Fast and extremely friendly customer service!!

name: Morpheus The chosen one
text: Great service. Had a good experience here. Mary was very professional and very helpful to me.

name: Chris Adair
text: Had a great buying experience..purchased a bracelet for my wife.. very well attended to.

name: Miranda Mason
text: Gorgeous jewelry and friendly staff.

name: taylor chambers
text:
Had great customer service , super friendly ,and awesome music . I was impressed with competitive pricing ,the verity of jewelry,and knowledge of products. With all of the choices ,I was able to make decision and wife is very pleases with gift . Thank you Kays for all the help .
Taylor.

name: Rachel Ford Cleveland
text: wonderful customer service & my diamonds are beautiful.

name: Nona Berry
text: Good selection of merchandise, great service assistance.

name: Gary Shekels
text: Good prices

name: Alexia Rose Niles
text:
The first woman that spoke to me was extremely rude. First asking me, “Did he say you could come look at rings?” What?! I told her I wanted to look myself and figure out what style I liked in person... She then proceeds to walk away and I received no assistance. A second lady comes by and was shocked I wasn’t getting assistance. The first woman piping in with, “Oh she’s just looking. She doesn’t need in anything.” Didn’t know I wasn’t allowed to look at the rings just like any other customer? I look very young, but I should not be treated like I am less than any other person coming in.

The second woman assisting me actually set up an account and allowed me to try on and see the rings. Though I found a pretty, dainty ring I liked and she says, “You don’t want that! Those are technically promise rings.” Which I responded that I liked how dainty it was and that’s more of the style I liked. I was not a fan of being told what I should and should not like. I will be finding another jeweler that has my best interest and desires in mind.

Overall not a good experience. There are many other friendly, reputable, and professional jewelers in Huntsville that I would recommend over Jared’s at Bridge Street ANY DAY. Please take your business elsewhere this holiday season and after.

name: Christy Vaughn
text:
Tasha is AMAZING!!! She is our go to girl at Jared's EVERY TIME since our first purchase in may of 2018!
Update*** picked up my custom design ring today with my rare black pearl I got in Hawaii... Absolutely amazing job

Next visit, since I can't do another review Tasha again helped me purchase MANY items, unfortunately I picked the same watch out for my husband he bought a couple years ago so the next day I went to return it, bought thru progressive leasing, and geta different one same price, Rachel the GM is also AMAZING! She spent 3 hours dealing with Progressive Leasing to get this all handled! Thank you all who work there, you all have the best Customer service I have ever seen and delt with!

Repairs and custom designs here are ABSOLUTELY beautiful and ALWAYS on time!!!!

name: Trenton McCall
text: So I knew exactly what I was looking for as I walked in and was kindly greeted by Rachel. She told me she would be with me in a moment and in a moments time she was there to assist me. I showed her the pictures of the two bracelets I was needing to purchase for Valentine’s Day. She disappointedly told me they do not have those in store I would have to order them on-line. I told her I’ve NEVER ordered anything on-line before. Rachel told me to come have a seat she would order them with me and I could just come back and pick them up when they arrive. She was kind and helpful. Doesn’t sound like much maybe to some, but I think she went out of her way to make sure I was happy. I’ll definitely be back

name: Addy Schmuck
text: Great customer service. Vickie was very helpful with us. Would highly recommend!

name: Treasure Williams
text: Excellent products, awesome staff. You can also sell them your (real) jewerly. Look online from pre-owned watches-great for if you are looking for a nice pre-owned watch

name: Bridget Williams
text: Best Jared's that I have visited.  They went above and beyond to fix my ring. Plus the employees are very nice.

name: Heather Welch
text: The Huntsville store was an amazing experience! We used Tasha and she was so knowledgeable and professional. She got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Angela King
text: Tasha helped us upgrade my engagement ring. She is very knowledgeable and fun to work with! Highly recommend!

name: Katreena Mullican
text: Had a great experience at Jared's of Bridge Street, Huntsville.  Mechelle was wonderful!  She helped us pick out a beautiful setting and stone from their impressive collection for our anniversary.  She took time to explain and present various options.  My ring was assembled, sized, and ready for pickup same-day.  Highly recommend stopping by!

name: Tina Wells
text: I was extremely disappointed and appalled at the treatment I received at this location. The lady met us at the door which was locked due to Covid, which is fine, I understand but when she opened the door, she basically asked what we wanted like we couldn’t enter the store without some kind of pass. That already made me uncomfortable. After telling her we were shopping for an engagement ring she led us to the counter to have a look. She then proceeded to ask us how long we have been together as if we needed to meet her approval. Next she asked where we met. I did not appreciate her being so nosey. After looking a a few rings, I didn’t see anything that had a large enough diamond for me. She sighed at me when I told her the one she showed me was not large enough. Overall made my experience not fun at all. I would not recommend shopping this location!!

name: Gary Watkins
text: Really nice jewelry at great prices

name: Royce Estes
text: Friendly people and beautiful merchandise!

name: Tonya Staggs
text: They dont sale pandora  any more😪. Very nice place.

name: Larry Burger
text: Great inventory and the best sales staff. They even cleaned each piece of jewelry before packaging it for me.

name: David Hambey
text: Extremely rude employees, they treated us like we were not welcome from the moment we walked into the store.

name: Sheryl Payne
text: So glad I stopped in on the day that i did.  I got to work with Ms. Tasha and she made my first whole (by myself) jewelry buying experience a success.  Will definitely be stopping through again!

name: Christina Mascarinas
text: Each employee I encountered was incredibly snooty and rude to the point it was almost comical because they have nothing to be snooty about. The jewelry was nothing to write home about, even if I would have found something I don’t want a piece from a store with such bad energy.

name: Joseph Cuzzort
text:
Typically, great customer service. Not today, no one said hello as I entered and I walked around the showcases multiple times and not one employee asked if they could assist me or say though would be with me in a moment.

Not a good experience today.

Joseph

name: Robin Warren
text: I was greeted as soon as I stepped in the door.  I  was treated  very professionally. My  rings were checked and cleaned.  Thank goodness I asked her to clean my other rings.  She saw some diamonds missing.   It is being fixed now.

name: J HONEZ
text: Terrible place to buy from.  Constant lies.  They never have your information in the system even though you spent thousands of dollars with them and show up for warranty work to maintain it.  They never seem to have you in the system so keep your paperwork.  They also like to chip your diamonds on purpose it seems so that they can force you into getting lesser diamonds or non certified diamonds to maintain your warranty.  Will not issue a refund for the lesser value diamonds they put into your rings either.  Maybe other Jared's are different but don't buy from this location.  Great scam they have going on

name: Charlotte Smartt
text: Everyone at the store was such a pleasure to work with. They take the time to explain everything you try out many options and they make you feel very comfortable shopping there. I highly recommend this store. They are  absolutely the best people to work with .

name: Jason Watson
text:
Very courteous, professional and prompt. Have been to this store twice,  and couldn't have asked for a better experience.  Lexi and Riley are awesome, and I can't thank them enough.  Knowledgeable,  friendly, and patient with my many questions.
Highly recommend Jared and this location! Will be back again and again.

name: Cherish Charles
text: The staff at this location are simply unparalleled in their friendliness, product knowledge and willingness to assist me every time I come in. I truly feel appreciated as a customer and would recommend without hesitation. Shout out to Brian, in particular for going above and beyond with my late night repair. I truly appreciate your help. Thank you!

name: Branden Schlesinger
text: Really amazing customer service!  They really went above and beyond to make everything perfect!

name: Marty Howard
text:
Great experience throughout engagement shopping experience. Went to several different Jewelry store and was treated like family at Jared's. Cameron was our salesperson and did a terrific job of listening and guiding us thru the process to find the perfect engagement ring as well as wedding rings. BTW She said YES and we were married yesterday. Thank you Cameron and support staff at Jared's.
Highly recommend!!!!

name: Kenneth Hughes
text: Awesome staff, service, and customer service! Patricia was an amazing sales associate!

name: Robert Makowski
text: They have a great store, and wonderful, knowledgeable people! They will make you feel comfortable, and treat you fairly. Me and my family loved the items we purchased. Thanks y'all I'll be back soon!

name: Jack Brown
text: This was my first purchase from Jared's. The entire transaction was very pleasant. They have a customer for life.

name: Dale Barksdale
text:
My husband and I wanted to buy new wedding bands for our 10th anniversary.  Cameron, our salesman, could not have made our experience any better. He was very knowledgeable and easy to work with. We could not be happier with our jewelry or the customer service.
We were so pleased with our experience we also bought a Citizen watch for my husbands birthday (his birthday is just a few days after our anniversary). We had to take the watch back the day after we purchased it because it did not work :(. Cameron also helped us with that. He swapped it out and was very  apologetic. We understand things happen (even with expensive pieces of jewelry), but the excellent customer service will keep us coming back.

name: Emily Gangl
text: The sales associates were extremely helpful and patient with me as I looked through many options for my wedding ring!

name: Don Ebert
text: Long story short without the details, Charles Brown AKA "Charlie Brown" as general manager at the Huntsville location went above and beyond to satisfy a customer...me.  Over what I believe to be a legitimate issue, I had begun to put Jared -Galleria behind me, both figuratively and literally!  Fortunately, Mr Brown caught me in the parking lot and asked to be given a chance to fix the issue.  I did.  He did and I suggest you try Jared's for your jewelry needs.

name: Aisha Buycks Realtor (Huntsville Madison AL)
text: I love Jared at Bridgestreet they take great care of your pieces. I have taken them my wedding set to tighten and clean. I always get them back perfect and blinging. Patricia Mitchell is awesome and gives great customer service. She listens and gets you exactly what you are looking. Their repair service are responsible and give a very reasonable turn around. They will also clean and redip your rings to bring them back up. They will continue to be my go to jeweler. They are friendly and very informative about their pieces.

name: Rae M
text: I have talked to them 3 times in store about getting a quote for a ring to be made. It was a wedding band we got from them 6 years ago. They don’t make it anymore so we have asked them 3 different times leading up to our 5th wedding anniversary how much it would cost to have a duplicate made. The second and third time they apologized that they hadn’t followed through. This last time 2 girls wrote down information and promised to get in contact with us soon after our last visit. Well our 5th anniversary has come and gone and we still don’t have a quote. Guess that’s not happening. Really frustrated.

name: Chelsea Marbut
text:
Insufferable customer service.
The gentleman I spoke with told me that although he could pull up my information and see my extended care plan, the previous store did not correctly handle my paper work so there was nothing he could do for me, as far as repairing my ring... remember he's telling me this as he's viewing my extended care plan.

His parting words for me were, "I'm sorry, I'm trying to teach people how to correctly use our system, and the other store didn't do it correctly."

Since this is the 4th time in two years that my ring has needed repairing, this was a terrible experience to accompany that.

Update:
The GM of the Hoover Location has helped resolve this problem via a phone call... through difficulty from the Huntsville Location.
We do not plan to use the Huntsville Store going forward.

name: T Mac
text: A very good place to shop

name: Kyle Jett
text: Excellent customer service. Staff was very helpful and informative.

name: Angie Clemore
text: This place is extremely discriminatory. My friends and I are all black youths with very well paying jobs and were intrested in their rings. When we got there we were instantly stared at and treated like we didn't belong. There was a tall white man who seemed very rude eyeing us the whole time and even made a sure to mention the quality of the security cameras without our asking anything. Half of us left to sit in the car (because of the cold treatment) and HE FOLLOWED US OUTSIDE!! Soon after security was called and we decided to spend our money somewhere less racist. My family, friends and I are never shopping here again. It's just disgusting.

name: Vinie Carter
text: Very good customer service
